It also has a nice metal filter screen at the mouth, I am assuming to catch scale residue if it builds up, as they recommend against putting tea or coffee in the kettle so it won't stain. We have a reverse osmosis drinking water system so have had no problems with any build up as of yet. Another neat feature is the keep warm button, so that if you are planning to come back for another cup of tea, the water remains warm for you for up to 4 hours. We have not mastered the keep warm button as of yet, as it tends to shut off way before that for us. I am guessing it is user error and I will have to read the manual to find out how to properly use that function.  Overall, my husband and I are very pleased with this purchase.

CommentsTitle: Rescue kettle came out better than my original choice!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2019
CommentsContent: I ordered another kettle previously, but there was a shipping problem and it got returned to sender.  So I decided to switch it up and go for this kettle.  I am not disappointed!It has a large heating surface and really does heat water quickly (though admittedly I haven't filled it past about 1 liter as I use it to make tea).  The temperature and keep warm controls are easy (no dialing in a specific temperature, just buttons to select what you want).  The manual comes with a handy guide of which temperature to select for each beverage type, though it would be nice if this guide was on a laminated card instead of in the booklette.  It's also a fairly good looking kettle!  One area for improvement could be an extremely low heat setting for making warm milk, but that was never a dealbreaker for me.All in all, was not disappointed.  The product is an electric kettle and does what it claims to do

CommentsTitle: Finally found the kettle I've been searching for
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I have owned dozens of kettles and I am so happy that someone has finally designed the ultimate kettle. The metal and plastic kettles I've owned all had these narrow windows and it was always difficult to see how much water was in the kettle. With this glass kettle it's so easy to see how much water is in the kettle and the fill markings on the glass are very legible (I also never get tired watching the water boil with the blue LED light, it's just so mesmerizing!). It's easy to clean, you can easily tell when it's dirty and the bottom is flat - unlike other kettles which have coils and are impossible to clean. I like having all the different heat settings for different teas and the keep warm function is really nice as well. It's really sturdy and well built - the buttons, the lid, the handle - nothing feels cheap. I've been using this kettle daily for 7 months now (I heat up water about 5-7 times a day) and I can't imagine having any other kettle. This kettle is the one - you must get this if you're thinking about buying a kettle.

CommentsTitle: Love the temperature options and the convenience!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent: I set an office in the second floor of our home and found it inconvenient to go down to heat water in the microwave. My meeting schedule just didn‚Äôt give me much time so I wasn‚Äôt drinking as much as I should. A friend told me about this product and I ordered it over others because of the temperature options. I don‚Äôt like super hot water and use the lower temp setting. This carafe is sturdy. The blue light adds a fun factor and I know when it is on. And the water heats incredibly fast. I‚Äôm enjoying more tea and also got a soda stream to round out my little beverage bar. Highly recommend this product as it works well, offers options and is easy to maintain.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2021
CommentsContent: We have used this kettle daily, sometimes multiple times a day, for 3 months. We are very happy with our purchase and would not hesitate to recommend this kettle. Some of our favorite features are the high water capacity, water temperature options and speed of heating the water. I particularly appreciate the control buttons being on the handle. Our previous kettle had a lever at the bottom you pushed down to turn it on and it never worked right. The ease of use, sturdy construction and convenient features earns it an A+ at our house.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 23, 2021
CommentsContent: This electric kettle is fantastic.  The user can easily select various temperatures through he click of a button.  Each button displays the temperature setting and the type of tea, which helpfully takes the guesswork out of remembering which setting for which tea.  Tea prepared a the proper temperature just tastes better.  The electric kettle has a sleek design of clear glass and metal, which means it will look fantastic sitting on your countertop matching other kitchen appliances.

CommentsTitle: Flawlessly perfect electric kettle with variable temperature
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 23, 2019
CommentsContent: I received this HadinEEon electric kettle with Variable temperature today as scheduled.I was so excited that used it immediately..IIt was really east to use w/o using instructions. All I can say is it's hands down flawlessly perfect and works precisely accurate to point. It also kept the water warm with selected temperature. Which means I can make tea or instant coffee in 12 hours. The hot water can also be used for cooking to cut the timing of cooking noodles, eggs, soup etc.I am totally pleased with my purchase of electronic kettle with verity temperature to choose from. I certainly recommend this item by all confidence. I am also uploading the videos that I recorded during the process.

CommentsTitle: Just started using it and already LOVE it!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Note: I did not get this product free - I used my own money.I LOVE this kettle. I purchased it because of the high reviews here and elsewhere on the internet and have not been disappointed. The feature I wanted was the variable temp control which works like a charm. You literally can't get anything easier. You push the temp you want, then start and you wait until it beeps it's done! And it lights up in a lovely calming blue color showing you it's heating the water. My tea never tasted better!I think I'm going to get another one for work too.

CommentsTitle: Effective, efficient water kettle for tea, coffee, hot water.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2021
CommentsContent: We replaced our old water heater with the HadinEEon Variable Kettle. We have enjoyed using it for the past 3-4 months, below are some insights:1. 6 Different temperatures for different teas, heats up quickly and kettle stays warm for a fair amount of time even without the constant reheating2. The hardware is of high-quality and the electric wire is very insulated (is not hot to the touch). I'm confident this kettle will last a long time.3. The inside is not prone to water damage as long as you empty it every night after use. Don't let water sit in the kettle for too long. If there is some minor water stains, you can add a bit of vinegar to water and boil to clean. Rinse after. Quite easy. Also try to use filtered water.4. Only complaint is that to open the kettle, the switch is on the lid instead of a button on the handle. (The temperature control buttons are the handle) So if the kettle is hot and you try to add more water, there could be heat & discomfort as you pry the lid open. Be careful there.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this kettle for my girlfriend for Christmas as she's been wanting an electric tea kettle for awhile. I did a lot of research before settling on this model, and so far I can say it's been perfect. She uses it far more than I do and she seems to love it. It makes tea preparation so much simpler than the stove top tea kettle we used to use. It's also infinitely easier to clean. The only temporary concern we had (and this would not be unique to this model) is we live in a city with harder water. Even with our filtered water it was leaving residue on the bottom that looked like it had burned to the bottom. However it turned out to come out pretty easily with some stronger cleaners and some elbow grease and look as good as new. Tea has become so much easier to prepare, and it looks sleek and beautiful doing it. The LED light looks pretty awesome when the lights are low. For me, though, it really comes down to performance. Thus far we've had no problems- it has met and exceeded expectations.

CommentsTitle: A stylish electric kettle that actually does everything it advertises.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I've always wanted an electric kettle that could variably control its own temperature for different teas. Im happy to say that this kettle does just that. With the different temperature selections working perfectly and the blue light indicators and beep when its done, it truly is a set it and walk away kind of kettle. Return when it beeps, and it pours like you'd expect it to. I usually make more than I need for 1 or 2 cups and then use the keep warm feature to keep it at the temp I selected - very handy!The only downside to this kettle is the time it takes to reach the temperature that you want, but its an acceptable timeframe if you want to be picky about a few degrees like me. So honestly at the end of the day - its not even a downside.

CommentsTitle: Super Fast Boil and Beautifully lights up my kitchen.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: I purchased this model and the base model without temperature control.I like the variable selections for green tea and I use it for hot tea for the kids because of their desire to drink right away.What I don‚Äôt like is that there is space on either side of the mesh strainer. It seems like it should cover the entire opening. Water can pass through 3 places whereas I would prefer just one pour spout.Otherwise this is a Great Kettle that I will continue to USE DAILY !

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2020
CommentsContent: It looks good on the counter, it heats up fast. Sometimes I watch it boiling, looks pretty neat. My ONLY complaint, is that theres no louder sound you can toggle on. It makes a quiet beep, which some people actually like. I dont hang out in the kitchen though while its going. I use the keep warm function, so it keeps it hot in case I forget to check on it soon enough. Really great tea kettle. Multiple water temps are great, since I want my water boiling and my SO wants her water cooler for her green tea.

CommentsTitle: Best Quality and Features for the Price!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2020
CommentsContent: When shopping around for an electric kettle, I had stumbled upon the Mueller one that's very popular, but saw the non-temperature controlled Hadineeon kettle a few results down with much better reviews and for a comparable price. When checking it out I was very impressed with what I saw, but THEN I saw this version, with the variable temperature for not much more - so I sprung!Couldn't be happier so far! It has worked flawlessly - it heats up fast, has great variable temperature output/control, keeps the water hot/warm automatically, and hasn't rusted (with proper airing after use).HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS! For the features, the capacity, the modern and clean design and ease of use, this is a no-brainer!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2020
CommentsContent: We have been enjoying this kettle so far. I have another kettle (also a top Amazon kettle) that also has temperature settings and there are a few things I like about this one better. This kettle has real buttons that require a firm "push" to activate, whereas the other kettle uses kind of a touchscreen-type button array... turns out, I prefer the real buttons.Also, this kettle's "keep warm" setting stays on for longer than the other kettle's, so the water stays hot all morning.One difference is this has glass sides whereas the other kettle has stainless sides which (I believe) are double-walled. The glass sides of this kettle, being single-walled, would perhaps be less efficient at holding heat than a double-walled kettle but I suppose that's pretty minor.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I decided to buy an electric kettle because I was consistently burning my green tea, which makes it bitter. I needed one with temperature control. I purchased this one and have been using it regularly. It heats the water quickly, beeps when it is done, allows me to keep the water warm at the temperature I want so I can pour more than one cup. The blue lighting is nice but not a necessity of course - just looks pretty. I really like how the cord wrap up into the base when not in use! I would definitely recommend this kettle to anyone interested in an electric kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2021
CommentsContent: I use this kettle to heat water at different temperatures for tea. I typically heat roughly 2 cups at a time, and it takes just a few minutes to get up to temp. The keep warm feature is useful in case I end up being busy for a couple extra minutes  and I'm not there when it gets to temp. I use this kettle 5 times per day sometimes (I drink a lot of tea) and it is not showing signs of wear.  Overall excellent for the price point. Would recommend (and have) to a friend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2021
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
  ¬†We use this kettle at least 6x a day.. maybe even 10! üòÅ I love how the temperature control is right on point and easy to use. My husband loves tea and being able to set the temperature accordingly is important to him. The kettle is a great size, doesn‚Äôt take much space and also holds a ton of water. It heats up pretty quickly and the noise alert isn‚Äôt loud or annoying (as you can see in the video). We live on a boat so space is important to us - this kettle is never in the way. Love that it is glass so you can see inside and how clean it is. Very easy to clean as well and feels very sturdy. We love it!! It‚Äôs an excellent product and we are very happy customers! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

CommentsTitle: Temp settings and keep warm function essential
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2020
CommentsContent: Really Convenient and super fast heating!I also really like the function which allows the water to stay heated, which is important to look for when purchasing. Additionally, I really enjoyed being able to choose which temperature I wanted my water to be heated to. That way if I wanted to make my tea early for later in the day, I could boil the water hotter. But if I wanted to drink the tea immediately, I would make it less hot so I didn‚Äôt have to wait for it to cool off.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I am very pleased with this kettle so far.  It heats water quickly to temperature and is easy to clean.  One feature I like is the lid.  It opens easily.  This kettle is a replacement for that of another manufacturer which didn't last more than a few months when it developed leaks and the lid became inoperable.  I'm a tea drinker and this is the first kettle I've bought where I can control the temperature.  This will come in handy for more than just my morning tea.

CommentsTitle: UPDATED: Received a free replacement, works slightly better. ORIGINAL: Only worked one total time.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2021
CommentsContent: UPDATED REVIEW:The company who made the kettle surprisingly sent me a free replacement kettle unprompted. I was very surprised by this. I gave it a fair shake, and a similar problem persisted in that it would not stop boiling, but the workaround to this is to simply unplug the kettle once boiling. At least the replacement still turns on and didn't completely cease functionality like the original unit. I'm mostly updating this review because of the sensational customer support that I didn't expect at all. They're trying their best, so at least if you get a lemon it won't feel like all hope is lost if you just contact their customer support.ORIGINAL REVIEW:The first time I used it I was amazed at how fast it boiled the water, if a little disappointed that it didn't stop boiling until half the kettle evaporated. Then it never worked again. No matter what buttons I pressed, it would not function anymore. When plugging it in, it would light up for a quarter second and then turn off. Completely defective product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 4, 2019
CommentsContent: This Variable temperature Kettle is really accurate, as tested with my Thermapen. All readings are within 1 degree. This unit heats up very quickly with 8 cups of water. Although I've just had it for a couple of days, I find the kettle very sturdy, well finished, designed with novel lighting to alert you to it's status.The instructions are detailed and very clear, including a setting guide for various types of tea and coffee. I can actually get my big hand into the opening for cleaning ...if I remove my watch!Overall, I am really impressed with this kettle!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2021
CommentsContent: The temperature controls are100% worth the extra price.  I can walk away and come back to get water that is just right to drink without it being too hot.And what a treat the Stay Warm option is, I come back later and it‚Äôs still hot!This kettle features extra capacity in comparison to most others as well, and the glass doesn‚Äôt fog up as easily.  I‚Äôm quite glad my last electric kettle died last year, as this one is much nicer.  I hope that helps!  Bye!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2019
CommentsContent: I enjoy a cup of tea in the afternoon, so I usually heat up water in the microwave until I seriously burned myself. I have been looking for an electric kettle for a while and hadn't found one that I liked. So I kept looking and came across the HadinEEon. There were so many positive reviews that I decided to take a chance. I am thrilled with this kettle! I have used it everyday since I got it and I am pleased. Hot water fast and hardly no effort. Great product!!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2019
CommentsContent: Works just as advertised. Use it multiple times a day and it works flawlessly. It was a replacement item for one that originally had functional issues. The customer service in getting it replace for free was stellar.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2020
CommentsContent: To be honest, I'm just getting into tea. At first, I just wanted to get something cheap, especially with everything going on. Most of us don't have a lot of money right now, you know? But I'm also the type of person who only likes to buy something once, and have that something last. Even if I spend the money later, that's still more money spent.Let me tell you, I'm very happy with what I bought! The multiple settings are fantastic, and it looks great too! My housemate even thought so too lol, especially when he saw the LED lights! It can get a little loud though, so be careful when others are sleeping!I like the fact that the cord coils underneath the heater, it really saves space! I also really appreciate the measurement markings. That with temperature control really made my decision for me. It even came with a warranty, and a little bag or citrus acid detergent to clean it. And man, is it FAST. Put 16 ounces in there and a minute later it's boiled. Make sure to listen for the beeps when it's done! It's a little soft, so it can be hard to hear if you're in another room, but I like that how quiet it is, since my housemate works at night and sleeps during the day.Do give it a try!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2019
CommentsContent: Dec. 5I'm glad I ordered this one.  It replaced an old pot that had died.*** Heats in about 5 minutes.*** Lovely blue light glows so pretty.*** VERY easy to open top to clean or to add water --- it's hard to understand previous complaints about this.*** I don't know why it beeps when you re-set the pot on the base, but it does not bother me.*** We have had no leaking at all, and have been using it constantly since it arrived.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2020
CommentsContent: I use this thing everyday and have it goin for like 6 hours a day. After 4 months it‚Äôs still going strong. The ring of lights is awesome, the keep warm feature is even cooler, and the capacity is the best I‚Äôve ever had in a kettle. It also gets to boiling way way faster than any gas-heated kettle I‚Äôve used. This thing‚Äôs the best price to quality ratio variable temp electric kettle choice in my opinion.The only bug I‚Äôve had with it is really insignificant and could just be my unit in particular. It‚Äôs that when I remove the kettle from the base for 5-10 seconds and it‚Äôs at boiling on ‚ÄòKeep Warm‚Äô, my unit will occasionally forget the settings and shut off. It usually remembers for up to 20 seconds of off-time as it‚Äôs supposed to, but sometimes it shuts off prematurely. Really doesn‚Äôt bother me at all though, as I‚Äôve got the muscle memory to just pop that sucker right back on to where I want it by sliding my thumb down the three buttons in 0.0035 milliseconds. And it‚Äôll instantly beep back to where it was it and we just keep sailing.I actually drove across the US with this, brewing pu-erh in the car. It can draw quite a bit of power to get water up to boiling so your mileage may vary trying to run this in a car haha (definitely not an intended or exactly safe use case, but it can be done). It‚Äôs held up really well and I consistently recommend this to all my friends.If you‚Äôre struggling on what to get, choose this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Just lovely for boiling water for tea/coffee etc.  I really enjoy the preset temperature controls so that you always brew the perfect cup of tea.  Also the light up feature adds a fun element so I know when the water is heating up and shuts off when water has reached the right temperature.  Super easy to use.  The kettle also has a built in strainer if you prefer to brew straight in the pot.  Sleek and stylish plus ease of use makes this the perfect kettle for me.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use and large capacity that heats up quickly.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2021
CommentsContent: Love this kettle. Heats up water fast!The keep it warm function lets us have hit water available for hours.The only thing I don‚Äôt like is the shirt cord. I know this is short on purpose for safety reasons, but my weird shaped counters make things awkward. (Nothing an extension cord can‚Äôt fix)I love the different temp settings, so there is no guess work if you need water a a specific temp. (Kids hot cocoa? Brewing special tea?)

CommentsTitle: Keeps water hot for tea through the afternoon, just the right temp.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 14, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
  ¬†Love this tea kettle. Heats water to the right temp for different types of tea and will keep it warm if you choose.  It does take a few minutes to heat, so not as quick as microwave or running water through the Keurig.  I have noticed it making a buzzing noise on occasion when it is off.  If you lift the kettle off the base and set it back down, it stops.  It will recall the last setting you used if you just hit start.  The light in the pot goes off when it reaches temp and will turn back on when it reheats.  Does make a little noise, but that doesn't bother me.  You can hear it in the video.  Outside of pot does get hot, also not an issue for me as no small children in the house.  Just a consideration if you do.  Over all, I love it!

CommentsTitle: So good I bought it twice!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2020
CommentsContent: Purchased this kettle for my daughter, a neophyte tea lover, whose frequent consumption of hot water kept a stovetop kettle on constant simmer.  Rather than use all that gas, she got this kettle as a birthday present.  I selected it because it was the largest, lowest priced kettle that had both an automatic shutoff (to not run dry) and no plastic touching the water (other than the frame holding the screen in the spout) to avoid the odd taste that can impart.  As a bonus, it has both multiple heat settings (labeled for different types of tea - again, she's a neophyte) and a keep warm setting.  Honestly, though, this kettle heats so quickly that the keep warm function almost isn't necessary, but it is nice to have.  Plus, it looks nice on our counter, which wasn't critical, but, hey, why not?  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars on "easy to clean" was that it narrows at the top enough that getting my (adult male) hand into it takes just a bit of pressure to pop in.  Zero issues for my daughter or wife.  Highly recommend.  In fact, this purchase was our second...for a friend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 16, 2020
CommentsContent: Fit and form are beautiful;  heating temperature options are perfect for the tea and coffee drinker, and it heats FAST!  I love the keep warm feature as well.  The capacity is great - listed as 2L, you can do more than that to squeeze out those extra cups, when needed.  Lastly, I was surprised with the extra bonus of being able to remove a hot pot and safely set it on any surface - the bottom has an insulated base - awesome when you want to take a hot pot of water to the table.  Highly recommend this product - it has allowed our family to replace the poor quality coffee makers with this and a french press - and coffee tastes better this way!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 18, 2020
CommentsContent: UPDATE ON NEW KETTLE!I contacted BOTH Amazon and the company that makes this kettle.I was able to quickly get a new one shipped out with NO issue through Amazon.HOWEVER, the company also reached out in order to touch base and make sure I was happy with my purchase and that the product was replaced! And it was!5 stars ALL DAY.GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICEGREAT PRODUCTGREAT RESPONSES FROM BOTH ENDS.THANK YOU.MY COFFEE IS DELICIOUS. ü§óü§óü§óü§óBuy this NOW.Disappointed. So many great reviews and mine does not work.Amazon is sending a new one.Blahh.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 19, 2021
CommentsContent: This electric kettle is fantastic! It has specific temperature settings for different hot drinks - black, oolong, green, white teas, French press. It has a ‚Äúkeep warm‚Äù setting which stays on for 4 hours. I heat a pot of water in the morning and refill my tea cup with hot water all morning! It‚Äôs great for making hot chocolate, as well. Made several cups for my daughter‚Äôs outside play date recently. It is a very attractive product. Sleek and clean looking. I would definitely recommend this product!

CommentsTitle: Saves time and money...what more can you ask for?
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 24, 2020
CommentsContent: What more can you ask for, you ask?PROS:- auto turn off feature is something a stovetop tea kettle can't compete with (while it's whistling for you to sprint and remove it before the whole house wakes up lol)- design is improved from older model. Lid opens wider and holds up on it's own- new added features to this model. Temp control, start/stop, keep warm option, bottom is wider than old model so the max line isn't as close to the top (so no chance of boil overs)- 212 F degree is approved by 2 generations older than me. My family is Asian so they like their coffee & tea scorching hot while I can't take the heat (literally) so it's nice that I can choose the desired water temp- has a filter pad- Large capacity, 8 cups. I thought I would rarely need to use the max capacity so I was hunting for a much smaller one (that doesn't exist btw). I actually almost always use the max when I'm cooking. Even for pasta I use the tea kettle then transfer the water to my gas stove. It saves me $ on my utilities.- Electric kettle is energy efficient & heats up faster VS stovetop only 35% heat energy is transferred to the potCONS:- the inside bottom of the kettle corrodes. Issue not resolved from the lower model; they just added another card to explain how to get rid of it but once you boil another pot it comes right back. I'm not sure what the metal is coated with or if the seal or corrosion seeps into the water you boil.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 5, 2019
CommentsContent: This is a great kettle for heating water. Fast water heating and has a "keep warm" button that rewarms the water periodically (a must for my busy mornings). This design is sleek and modern - the base has a blue light which is very pleasant. I like the see-through nature of the kettle - easy to see when water is ready and when cleaning is necessary. Overall, I am thrilled with this kettle! My teenage boys even love it because it makes making ramen quick and easy! Go ahead - buy it - you'll love it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2020
CommentsContent: So gross!  I bought this kettle in July 2020 and very soon thereafter I did notice some discoloration on the bottom.  It continued to get worse, but I thought it was burnt on the outer part of the kettle, beneath the glass.  It was still working, but then it continued to get worse and I took a closer look today (12/26/20) and saw little pieces of the burnt metal floating in the water.  Who knows how long we have been ingesting these toxic particles in our tea and coffee?!  So disgusted and disappointed by a 5-star review product!  Thankfully, I had purchased the insurance plan.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 28, 2021
CommentsContent: This kettle had replaced our previous big box store brand kettle that only lasted about a year. We use this for our business to serve tea to guests. One feature that is super great about this kettle is the 4 hours it stays warm, which for our needs is the perfect amount of time. One word of warning, after about a year of use we did find that the little clips holding the lid down started to become brittle and break off into the kettle, this happened after a year of everyday use for about 12 hours per day. This is the second one we have purchased and couldn't be happier, we will continue to replace this one with the same in the future.

CommentsTitle: Great product but not scaling resistant
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2021
CommentsContent: We purchased the HadinEEon Variable Temperature Electric Kettle in Jan 2021 as a replacement for our metal electric kettle. We use it almost daily and would definitely purchase again/recommend to friends and family. We like it because: its made of glass, holds 8Cups/2L of water, has a wide opening for easy cleaning, its sturdy and feels well built, boils water quickly, and has different temperature options.Our only complaint is the water spots/hard water scaling at the bottom (see picture). To be fair, the product isn‚Äôt advertised as limescale resistant and we knew this was common from reading other reviews so we didn‚Äôt think it was fair to reduce the rating. HadinEEon tries to address this issue in two ways. First, the spout has a built-in mesh filter to catch any particles when pouring, though we haven't had enough build up to be worried about that. And secondly, HadinEEon provides a "Citric Acid Detergent" for cleaning, though we haven't tried it yet so we can‚Äôt confirm it works. Full disclosure, we don‚Äôt use filtered water for boiling and we‚Äôre on the US east coast where the water tends to be less hard.Overall we‚Äôre very pleased but its important to know that this electric kettle is not scaling resistant.

CommentsTitle: Best kettle I have ever had!!‚ù§Ô∏è
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this electric tea kettle. I really enjoy hot tea. What I like best is that I can heat the water to the best brewing temperature for each type of tea I drink. I used to have to try to catch the kettle before it started boiling for my green tea. Now I can set the kettle at 175 for green tea with the keep warm button and walk away. When I get back it has been held at the right temperature and I can brew several cups in a row. My husband prefers iced tea made with black tea. He likes being able to heat up 8 cups of water to boiling hot so quickly. I also like the nice blue lights. It is easy to tell that the unit is on and looks good on the counter.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 19, 2020
CommentsContent: We purchased this glass tea kettle as an alternative to the so-called "stainless steel" kettles, which, based on reviews, rust and, therefore are not manufactured out of stainless steel. We are very happy with our kettle - large capacity, boils water very quickly, has a good "keep water at boiling temperature for an extended period of time" feature.  According to instructions, it will keep water hot for up to 12 hours, but we haven't tried to do so, since it will draw power every time it kicks on. Overall a good looking, practical kitchen appliance.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 24, 2020
CommentsContent: Needed a new kettle to boil water and this is Amazon choice one and so I took a chance and so far so good will update if I have any problemsWhen pouring the heated water to my teacup the kettle leaks from the bottom seam and after Gave it a 4 star review I was contacted via email to change my review to 5 stars/Update the kettle I had got short in it and stopped working but because of the company providing a replacement right away and the new one seems to be good so I‚Äôll give this 5stars for now and update it if need be

CommentsTitle: Great temp control kettle, mid range $
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I spent a long time looking at temperature controlled electric kettles to buy; I drink a lot of tea, and wanted to start preparing it at the desired temp. When quarantine started I began working from home and started using this kettle... a lot. As in, every morning without fail, sometimes in the afternoon, and occasionally for bedtime tea. I can honestly say I LOVE this kettle!!It comes to temp quickly and isn't too loud. The bright colors are nice and it also has a "stay warm" feature that keeps water to temp. The package says it will for up to 4 hours, but I have only used it for 1 or 2 hours, so can't confirm.Minor inconveniences, the top doesn't always "lock" into place, so I just give it a little bop before starting to hear the telltale "click". (I have accidentally used with the top barely open and it was fine though. Just make sure you don't pour that way!!). Also, more of a region thing, but since we have super hard water where I live the bottom and sides of it get chalky/cloudy REALLY easily. Hasn't been bad with fingerprints, though!Overall, I would definitely purchase it again. The extra $40 for a name brand kettle doesn't seem worth it to me, especially since this one performs great!

CommentsTitle: Great quality, heats water up quickly, and looks very modern.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2019
CommentsContent: I ordered this kettle as a replacement for my Kalorik, which died eventually after 6 solid years of service.  This HadinEEon kettle model I bought to replace my old kettle is awesome.  It appears to be very high quality.  I made few batches of hot water today for tea and the kettle heated up very quickly.  The temperature settings are a convenient way to get an ideal heat for a variety of beverages.  My wife liked the blue LED lights, too, that indicate the kettle is heating.  I am satisfied with my purchase!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 15, 2020
CommentsContent: My family love this kettle. First, it's made from the good material. The quality is very good. This device is giving very high temperature, and very fast. We love the beautiful blue lights. Also, you have a lot of different temperatures to chose from. The best is the button which keeps water hot up to 4 hours. We are very busy family, so we love that this kettle is doing everything automatically. You do not have to stay and wait. You can do your stuff and come back and enjoy hot tea or coffee.  Very good product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely am in love with this product! As an avid tea drinker, I wanted to upgrade to an electronic tea kettle with temperature control to make all my teas at the ideal temperature and can taste the difference, especially with a loose leaf earl gray I bought. I love that they have a nice chart of the temperature needed for most varieties of tea in their instruction manual as well. It holds a good amount of water, and the keep warm function is so handy when you want a second cup. Along with the kettle, came information about their warranty and an opportunity to get a free gift with a review. I would highly recommend this tea kettle!

CommentsTitle: Useful kettle for a tea drinker
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 12, 2020
CommentsContent: I love using the electric kettle. It's easy to use and the buttons make it even more accessible so you can prepare different kinds of teas. I actually make a lot of different varieties like white tea, green, matcha, herbal, french press coffee, etc. So this totally serves my purpose so far. I used it quite a lot since i bought it. I just let it cool down before rinsing the interior with water, and just leave the lid open after use so there's no condensation, which may lead to rust of any stainless steel parts.All in all a good buy, since it's very useful to me.

CommentsTitle: Great Kettle and Great Customer Service
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 26, 2020
CommentsContent: The kettle is very attractive and works well. I especially like that it is glass and the bigger 2.0 L capacity. I really wanted the variable temperature options since we drink a lot of tea. Quieter than my previous kettle.Initially, I thought there was a problem because for all of the temperatures except for 212Àö F, the unit kept starting and stopping. I contacted the manufacturer via email (support@hadineeon.net) and they replied the same day. They supplied the following explanation:Here I would like to explain that when the temp is set other than 212, it will take a longer time to reach the target temp. When the water temp is about to reach set temp, the kettle will be in a start-stop adjustment for water to gradually approach set temp. That means the kettle starts and stops heating over several times for reaching target water temp. Once the water reaches the target temp, the kettle turns off immediately and make beep sounds.They were correct and that is exactly how the kettle works. Since I now understand this, I realize that the kettle works extremely well. I am very happy with it and with the customer service that I received. I would definitely recommend this kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2020
CommentsContent: This electric kettle is the best thing I have purchased in a long time. What a great idea. Just mad that I never thought of buying one of these before. And to get one one as good as this one was just lucky. It has clear labels for temperature settings with the top 10 or so tea types listed on the keys for easy startup. The 'keep warm' feature is great too. This keeps the water constantly at whatever temp you desire. It just keeps track and cycles on end off to keep it at that perfect

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 4, 2021
CommentsContent: Had to order another electric glass kettle as my previous one (different company/different model) broke.  I order this one because of the temperature choices and especially the keep warm option.  It arrived the next day and I used it after following the before initial use instructions.  It boils several cups of water quickly and beeps when the water is ready. I am very pleased with this electric kettle. It is sturdier and has a larger capacity of the previous kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2020
CommentsContent: We don't drink coffee and were just boiling water for our teas.  I knew that green tea should be at a lower temperature, but didn't really have a way to measure it easily.  My wife has been drinking Jasmine tea and that's 175,  I can't tell much of a difference, but someone that know tea better than me came up with the temperatures.  My English breakfast is at 200.It does boil fast and I like the temperature hold if you are not near the kettle when it gets to temperature.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2021
CommentsContent: I bought this to replace my old kettle that died, and selected this one specifically for the temperature control because I am an avid tea drinker. Using the correct temperature for different types of tea is important to get the best flavor profile, so it is important to me that the temps are accurate. Welp, I used a thermometer to see how accurate the temperatures are, and they're all about 10F degrees cooler than the setting I selected. I can understand a couple degrees of variance but 10F is way off. This is extra irritating to me because the kettle takes a while to reach the (incorrect) temperature and makes a show of turning on and off to "adjust" the water to the supposed correct temperature. It is neither fast to heat the water, precise in temperature, or good for getting the optimal flavors out of tea as it has been advertised to do.The only good things I have to say are that it has good safety features such as dry boil protection and auto shut off. Having the kettle be made of glass is nice as it is really easy to see the water level. It is easy to clean as well.If having an accurate temperature is important to you though, this kettle is a hard pass.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 13, 2019
CommentsContent: This electric kettle has all the options you need. The variable temperature settings is awesome - no guesswork. The keep warm feature is very handy. I use this kettle mainly for making coffee with my AeroPress. This heats water to the exact temperature required & much faster than using the microwave. I‚Äôm sure this will come in very handy in the cooler months since my husband prefers tea over coffee. Hot water will be ready for both of us. There are so many different electric kettles available & I‚Äôm glad I chose this one!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2020
CommentsContent: I haven't been a huge tea drinker, mostly because I didn't like the way most teas tasted, even if they smelled wonderful.  Come to find out not all teas should be brewed/steeped the same...many need different temperatures!  Enter this amazing tea kettle!  I love I can select the proper temperature for my water with just a push of a button!  It heats the water quickly and the best feature for me is the "keep warm" feature.  I can enjoy a cup of tea and not worry about having to reheat the water as the kettle keeps it at the right temperature for me!

CommentsTitle: A Great Way to Heat Water Safely
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2021
CommentsContent: Previously, I had used an electric kettle that boiled water but without a temperature gauge. After accidentally spilling scalding  water on my foot while preparing tea,I learned about electric kettles that were able to vary the heat temperature of the water for the type of tea used.This kettle has met my needs perfectly.It is a high quality product and the price is affordable. I feel very safe using this and highly recommend it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Bought this to replace an old, cheap plastic one from college. This one looks so much better and is no doubt better for me than plastic. We drink lots of tea in our house, and this does well. It heats water quickly, and to the specified temperature*. I haven't gotten out a food thermometer to verify each temperature setting, but it seems to be fairly accurate, and you can taste the difference when you make tea.Auto-shutoff when it reaches temp - this works well for all but 212F. I live at ~5000 ft (1524 meters) elevation, so it never reaches 212F*, and thus never shuts off. This isn't a big deal for me, as I don't usually wander away when boiling water, and if I were really concerned, I could just use the 200F setting, which stops just fine. Asking the engineers to add a barometric pressure sensor to auto-adjust the boiling point seems like it would be overkill.*Water boils at 203F (95C) at 5000 ft (1524 meters)

CommentsTitle: Best Kettle in the Market by HodinEEon
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 27, 2021
CommentsContent: What sets this Kettle above the rest of similar products is the variable heat setting for boiling water that you need for  every type of tea or instant coffee  It can be set to keep the water hot for hours. Bringing water to a boil is very quick. Because it is made of glass, while the water is boiling, no plastic or metal is involved during the process. Its unique design of transparent interior with glowing lights while boiling is a unigue feature.You pay a bit more for this product but it is all worth it. As expected, it meets my tea and instant coffee drinks any time of the day. HodinEEon line of products  are of good quality!

CommentsTitle: Only had it a day, but I'm in love with it...
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 13, 2020
CommentsContent: It is really beautiful - I love the way it glows blue when it is on.  It heats up VERY quickly to the right temperature and then the blue light goes out telling you it is ready to pour.  The bottom and handle (which is very ergonomic) stay cool making pouring a pleasure.  I leave it on my drying rack to cool after making a pot.This is not a problem for me - but I have large hands: the handle is a little wide leading me to believe those with small hands might have some trouble grasping a full pot.

CommentsTitle: Just what I've been wanting for years
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 1, 2019
CommentsContent: I am an avid tea drinker and have gone through far too many electric kettles that only lasted a year or two before ceasing to work (or almost starting an electrical fire, like one did!).  I first saw a temperature-controlled electric kettle about 15 years ago and dreamed of owning one so that I could make my teas with the perfect temperature water.  This kettle is everything that I've dreamed of owning for all those years and more.The kettle can be set to warm the water to any of a half dozen different temperatures and then, if desired, keep the water at that temperature until you either turn it off or many hours pass and it turns off automatically.  Between the good price, beautiful design, and wonderful controls and performance, this is the one kettle that I hope lasts forever because I can never imagine wanting anything different.  It really is the best electric kettle I've ever owned (and I've owned quite a few!).

CommentsTitle: This is a great electric kettle with variable temperatures.  I highly recommend.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2021
CommentsContent: I purchased this kettle because I want to start drinking tea.  I wanted an electric kettle that offered variable pre-programmed temperatures.  This kettle is great.It heats the water quickly (to me), lets out a loud beeep when it is at the temperature wanted, and has the option to keep the water warm.  The kettle lights up with a pretty blue.The kettle is a little heavy, but manageable.  I brewed some tea with it and the tea turned out perfectly.  I'm so glad I purchased this item.  Highly recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 30, 2019
CommentsContent: I used to boil my daughters water for her bottles in the stove & it would take forever!!! It was so dreading. I boiled the water and would put it in a hot thermal to keep the water warm. Ever since I bought this, it has been a life saver! I boil water for my daughters bottles and it has the option to keep the water warm through out the day. It has a "keep warm"  button that if you press it, it keeps the water the WHOLLLLEEE DAAAYYY! I really recommend this water boiler! It boils the water in half the time then when you boil it in the stove. It takes me at least 3 min to boil the water, when in the stove it takes about 7-10!!! Get ya'll one of these it will change the way you boil water!!!!

CommentsTitle: Easy to use variable temperature kettle
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 8, 2020
CommentsContent: I use this kettle for three main purposes: i) heating water for hot cereals, ii) heating water for tea, and iii) heating water quickly for use in cooking.  So far, the kettle has been easy to use and heats water quickly.  Before the first use, the manufacturer recommends filling it and boiling the water twice.  That took about 15 minutes in total; super easy.The only minor thing to note is that after setting the desired temperature, you have to press "Start" to begin heating the water.  I realize that sounds obvious, but the device lights up as soon as you press any button (including the temperature selection button) so you might get the impression that it is already heating before pressing Start.Overall, seems like a solid purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 23, 2019
CommentsContent: We have always used a stove kettle, but were searching for an electric one. This one had the largest capacity and one of the highest powers, and as we drink a bunch of different teas and coffees, the different temperatures were a huge plus. We have been using this for a few weeks now and dont know how we lived without it before. The variable temperature, the keep warm; fantastic! Its easy to fill, and we even like the blue light and the noticeable but not annoying tone to let you know its come to temperature, in case you are not completely mesmerized by the bubbles and the lights.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 8, 2020
CommentsContent: I mainly got it because I know I would have to drink a lot of water during this pandemic to keep myself healthy and if I get sick I have to be drinking lot of hot water continuously. This is perfect due to its temperature control so that I can set the desired drinkable temperature I want without any effort. Also once it‚Äôs hot I can maintain the same temperature for few hours with its keep warm feature. These are the few measures I take to be ready if I get affected. I have my herbal teas ready as well with my own reusable cloth tea bags üôÇUpdate: its been a month and am much more impressed with the usefulness and its convenience. This has become an essential part of my daily life and am so glad i got it. Can‚Äôt be more happier üôÇ

CommentsTitle: This is a GREAT Tea Kettle!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 30, 2020
CommentsContent: We decided to get serious about having a good cup of tea now and then, and decided to spring for a nice, automatic tea kettle.  Found this one on Amazon, with great ratings, and so many nice features, so I thought I would give it a try.  Haven't been disappointed!  Works wonderfully well.  Using it almost every day now.  Seems to be very well-made, and we especially like that it has preset buttons for various temperature options along with "start/stop" and "keep warm" buttons.  Heartily recommended, if you want a very nice kettle!  (And I hope you enjoy a good "cuppa," as the Brits might say!).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 19, 2019
CommentsContent: Our old water boiler quit working recently and we decided it was better to just spring for a good one. This one did not disappoint. The "keep warm" function is great, as we're easily distracted "doers" who wander off to get a few things done while the water heats up, but then take 10 minute to come back and pour tea. With the old boiler, we'd have to reheat - no longer! I also like the different temp options with suggested tea types on each. Seriously, this thing is pretty great.We did find the lid a bit stiff to open, but we'll get use to it. I also found it a bit sketchy that there were so many 5 star reviews. As it turns out, they ship out a flyer with each product that says you're "randomly" selected and if you leave a review, you can get a free gift... not exactly paying for reviews, but darn close. That being said, the product actually delivers, so... here's my legit 5 star review and I'm cashing in on my free gift to boot. :)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2021
CommentsContent: I absolutely love the HadinEEon Temperature Electric Kettle.It is a excellent design , made with high quality, clear and strong glass . It is easy to open the top section to pour water inside,  the kettle boils really fast and is nice and quiet.The keep warm function works great and I like the beeping signal when it is done boiling.This product is also backed by a 3 year warrantee when you register your product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 27, 2019
CommentsContent: We love this electric kettle! Setting different temperatures is a easy as pressing a button. This is perfect for setting just the right temperature to steep different types of teas. We put our teas in stainless steel tea infusers and, after the water has reached the correct temperature, hang them with their hooks on the top of glass kettle for 5 minutes. This gives us 8 cups of tea in minutes. The keep warm feature is also great.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2021
CommentsContent: Failed after 8 months.I absolutely loved this kettle. We used it A LOT and appreciated the different temperature settings and the keep warm function. But it completely failed after 8 months. You can only return for one month, so I‚Äôm out the cost and need to purchase a new one. My kettle before this one lasted for years. Very disappointed!FOLLOW UP: Manufacturer sent me a new kettle after the first one failed. I am impressed by this level of customer service. Thank you!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 6, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle looks very attractive with the blue lighting around the base when it heats, and glass walls.It costs more than I would generally want to pay for a kettle - but since it says the base won't rust and the lid looks solid (2 problems we've had with cheaper kettles over the years) - I'm willing to pay a bit more if it lasts longer!It's simple to operate and has a large capacity.  It doesn't seem to be faster than other kettles at boiling water, but it is quieter, which I appreciate.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 31, 2021
CommentsContent: I researched several brands online and I choose this tea kettle.  I enjoy various types of tea: black, oolong, white, etc. and with this kettle I have the temperature choices for each variety.  I also chose this one which had a clear glass kettle to be able to make sure that both the inside of the kettle, and the water, were pristine.  My favorite feature (which my previous tea kettle lacked) was the "Keep Warm" option for an easy hot !  2nd cup of tea.  If there would be one thing I'd change:  I wish the kettle was a little smaller.  All in all I would highly recommend this tea kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 18, 2020
CommentsContent: We were looking for a kettle that allows us to control the temperature of the water as we make pour over coffee every day. We were using a tea pot and let me tell you this kettle is a game-changer. Not only is it easy to use and to clean, but it looks great as well! That is very important when you have it on your counter all the time. If you are looking to up your barista game or simply have hot water fast -- this is the kettle for you.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 6, 2020
CommentsContent: Lovely for the first 3 months,then  leaked and died. What a waste of money!!!!! Luckily, I had kept my old Breville one,which seemed like it was giving up the ghost, but is still going  !!

CommentsTitle: Great Kettle that is Ideal for every coffee and tea fanatic!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 9, 2020
CommentsContent: This electric kettle is very easy to use and boils the water pretty fast within minutes! What I like is that I am able to keep my boiled water warm for a long time, so I can always come back to get more hot water for my tea or coffee. The blue LED lights are a nice touch and notify me when my water is ready! It is sturdy and durable and also has different temperature settings for how you like your tea or coffee! The price is also reasonable and I know this kettle will last me for many years! This kettle also has memory settings, so it will know how your preferences! Great quality, easy-to-use, and overall the best electric kettle!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2020
CommentsContent: The first one of these I purchased didn't work. But the replacement I was sent works perfectly! I love that you can choose different temperatures and it looks nice with the LED lights. It holds a lot of water and is much quicker than using a microwave to heat water. The customer service is also excellent!! They really stand behind their products and want to please their customers.

CommentsTitle: Worked well at first but glass broke in a few months
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2021
CommentsContent: First, customer service was excellent.  They stood by their warranty and refunded the cost of my purchase without hesitation, even offering additional gift cards.  I recommend this company overall.  In the case of this particular kettle, after just a few months of use, the glass broke irreparably near the top of the handle.  Until then, we really liked the kettle.  Having never used a kettle with temperature control, we didn't know what we were missing.  For tea it is essential, which we now appreciate.  The capacity and features of this kettle are very good, the accuracy of the temperature OK, although not within 2 degrees of setting (we verified with a calibrated thermometer), but the reliability of this particular unit was unacceptable.  We replaced the broken kettle with a Cuisinart CPK-17 PerfecTemp 1.7-Liter Stainless Steel Cordless Electric kettle, which we find superior in all ways, apart its smaller capacity.  If you are fortunate enough to get a HadinEEon unit that does not have a problem (and apparently many people have had reliable units) then you will probably be quite pleased with it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 16, 2021
CommentsContent: Absolutely love this electric tea or coffee pot. It hold up to 8 cups, keep warm setting is amazing.So far I‚Äôm very happy with this product I would recommend it to friends and family.A bonus, instead of running an electric stove for tea kettle which is 220 volts, I‚Äôm now using 110 volts which is saving money on the electric bill.Also it has an attached strainer for those who like brewing tea with leaves.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 31, 2021
CommentsContent: I got this kettle for Christmas so I've had it for a few months and it is great! It is so pretty and works just as beautifully. The pre-set temps make it easy to correctly brew a wide range of teas without any trouble and the low profile of the kettle and base mean I can leave it on the counter without losing too much room. We do have very hard water where I live so some build up occurs on the heating element but that was expected (it happens in my stovetop kettle also) and is easily cleaned with the included cleaner or vinegar. I am very hapoy with this purchase!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 6, 2020
CommentsContent: We are pleased with the purchase and the kettle is working well. Unlike our previous kettle that had pressure-sensitive buttons that didn't always work, the buttons on this kettle are actual physical buttons and they work really well. There are several temperature options on this kettle and the one thing that is a little confusing is that if you choose a setting other than the boiling option, the kettle does not beep when it comes up to temperature. You can kind of tell that it is "done" when the heating elements stop heating, but other than that, there's no real indicator that the water is ready. I like the glass kettle so you can see the water boiling or heating up and the blue lights that come on while it is heating up. We use it a LOT for tea and my son loves it for making french press coffee too

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Since moving to the United States (US) four years ago we have tried a number of Kettles that work on 110 Volts - We were used to the speed of boiling water on the 220 Volt Kettles widely used outside the US where water boils within 4 or 5 minutes and not a single kettle we've had since we arrived boils any quicker than 8 minutes when filled to capacity.The HadinEEon not only looks beautiful, but boils exceptionally faster than anything we've seen using 110 Volts - We're back to the 4 to 5 minutes we were used to on 220 Volts.The fact that we can "forget" to close the lid and kettle will still turn off is also an added bonus. Sadly upon a few occasions with the other kettles we've owned I have failed to ensure the lid is closed tightly - if not watched (and stopped) the kettle will keep boiling and then boil dry and sometimes never work again - I love the fact that the HadinEEon is smart enough to not have that happen.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2021
CommentsContent: We went back to a traditional tea pot for awhile but then my daughter started getting into making her own teas.  I did a bunch of research on electric tea pots and fell in love with this on due to the fact that you can choose different temps for different types of teas.  Well this thing did everything it said it would.  We are so pleased with all of the features ( especially the keep warm option).  I would highly recommend this tea kettle.

CommentsTitle: Great product for those that don‚Äôt know what they‚Äôre looking for in a kettle
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 13, 2021
CommentsContent: We‚Äôve been very impressed with the kettle. We didn‚Äôt realize that there were specific temperatures for each kind (or most different kinds anyway) of tea. It has elevated our tea game significantly and made the whole experience much more enjoyable. We have recently ventured in to using the kettle for oatmeal. Although there is not a setting for it, it has been a game changer as we can now make boatloads of instant oatmeal at once rather than heating each individual bowl of water. Two enthusiastic thumbs up!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I waited a bit before posting this review to get a true feel for the kettle.Wow!The temperatures are perfect and incredibly care free. Exactly what I was looking for.The kettle itself is well made and aesthetically pleasing. It seems like it's built to last, but we will see!The price... The price is dope. I had been researching kettles from other brands (Cuisinart specifically) and this one is around half the price and, honestly, they have the same general build and appearance.I'm very pleased and I will be recommending this to friends and family if the subject arises.

CommentsTitle: Get it just for the different water temperature controls.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2021
CommentsContent: What makes this kettle special is the different temperature settings conveniently located on the handle. You may think you don‚Äôt need this, but trust me, it‚Äôs a great feature. The only downside is that you may get used to it and other kettles you might end up using somewhere else (at a hotel or a friend‚Äôs house) will seem subpar.I took one star off because the first one we received stopped working after 3 weeks. But we returned it and got it replaced.You could tell we loved the kettle because we missed its convenience every day we didn‚Äôt have it until we received the replacement.It‚Äôs been 3 weeks. So far so good.

CommentsTitle: Great value and features, some small improvements would make it a five star product
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2021
CommentsContent: Bought this to replace a Zojirushi Water Boiler that I had used for years.  Had issues keeping product from rusting and temperature control.  Researched several models and looked at higher priced models like Oxo and Breville.  Settled on this as the price was fair and there were lots of features e.g. keep warm, and several temp settings for different teas and coffee.  Boils water well but not the fastest compared to other reviews electric kettles but fast enough.  Some small improvements (1) louder chime when the boiling temp has been reached, (2) light stays on until the boiling temp reached, seems to go one and off discriminately.  Other than that very happy with the product and would recommend.

CommentsTitle: It Does the Job and its Beautiful
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 12, 2020
CommentsContent: FINALLY!!! A beautiful addition to my countertop that is very low maintenance, easy to use and provides water that stays hot longer than 30 minutes. I‚Äôve used it a few times and there are no stains on the heating plate like I‚Äôve seen on other units. I‚Äôve wasted a lot of money on well researched containers that falsely state that they keep drinks hot/cold for hours. I love this machine. I bought 2. One for my daughter.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I've had a bunch of electric kettles.  This is my first with the multiple temperatures, something ESSENTIAL if you like white tea which is seriously bitter if you heat the water to boiling.  I'm excited to have white tea!  What I like about this kettle is that it is glass since it's simply COOL to watch the water boil and this kettle also has blue lights that go on as it's heating, adding to the coolness.  It heats up QUICKLY (way faster than either the stove or microwave for a family's worth of water).  All of us are psyched for that.  I'm not sure why it has a mesh at the spout.  I guess it's for people who actually brew loose tea in the kettle, but for people like me who just boil water, it's an unnecessary piece, and my last kettle (different maker) had one of those that snapped off.  Overall, I'm very pleased with this kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2021
CommentsContent: I have been using this kettle daily for over a month.  I originally purchased a different, less expensive brand that lasted on for a couple of months before it broke down.  I absolutely love the ability to warm the water to the varying temperatures as well as the option to keeping the water warm.  Easy to use, arrived on-time, packaging good.  Although a little more expensive, I would purchase again for the added features.

CommentsTitle: Excellent Kettle for precise water temps....Easy to use
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 9, 2019
CommentsContent: Product arrived double boxed and in perfect condition.  The HadinEEOn Kettle appears very well made, everything fits tightly, no rattling or loose parts.  Instructions on using and caring for product are well written and easy to understand.  Some have mentioned a issue with the length of power cord being to short but I had no issue with placement in my kitchen.After turning the unit on, I cycled one full pitcher on boiling as instructed and then began heating fresh cold water at the different temperatures that can be selected via the control panel on the kettle handle.  I tested each temperature setting using two separate digital thermometers and both digital thermometers were either spot on or within 1 degree of the temperature selected on the unit.HadinEEon Electric Kettle will get much use for heating water to very specific temperatures for teas I steep.  This is a very good product and I highly recommend it.  The kettle has a three year warranty as well.....

CommentsTitle: Helped keep us in warm beverages during the worst snow storm Texas has seen in decades!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 22, 2021
CommentsContent: Note - I am writing this review for incentive from the company, but the opinions are all mine.We have been using this daily for a little over 2 months (including the week almost the entire state of Texas shut down from freezing temps and snow), and my daughter has now added it to her wish list of items for when she move out.  It is convenient, easy, and practical.  I have used it to warm water for tea, coffee, and instant cocoa.  Is it an essential kitchen must have, maybe not, but I have enjoyed having it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2021
CommentsContent: There are a few things I really appreciate when looking at buying an electric kettle and they may not be the obvious ones. First, the Keep Warm setting is so nice. I make my coffee in the morning and I may not want another cup for an hour or more. By keeping the water warm, it takes mere seconds to get back up to the temperature it needs to be to have hot coffee or tea. Another small but important feature is that it's clear. To me, this goes beyond basic aesthetics, even though the blue light is cool. Anyone who has ever owned a solid colored kettle knows that it's annoying that you can't see how much water is left in it and if you're anything like me, you're constantly checking it to make sure you don't heat up an empty kettle. The last thing, which is also small, are the cup line markings. If you need a specific amount of hot water for something, having those line markings is really nice to have to quickly reference.

CommentsTitle: Highly recommend the HadinEEon Electric Kettle for Reliability, Quality and Price
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 16, 2020
CommentsContent: The HadinEEon Variable Temperature Electric Kettle was a great purchase. The buying process through Amazon.com was simple, easy to track and the shipment arrived to my house in a timely manner. This is a beautiful product as glass electric kettles go. I started to use this immediately. The functions are great, easy to use and follow. It is a sturdy and reliable product. It has a large capacity, with up to 10 cups. The push button temperature settings, and the keep warm feature are great. This kettle boils water very quickly. The kettle has a sleek ergonomic design. The temp push buttons are well placed, and the base is very sturdy.  I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking at purchasing an electric kettle. Great product, and highly recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2021
CommentsContent: Love everything about this electric kettle. It heats quickly with a full kettle and the keep warm feature is something I use a lot. The only reason it is not 5 star is that the interior metal base began to discolor and corrode with the first use. It has not affected function but will require more frequent deep cleaning.The vendor did not honor the ‚Äúfree gift‚Äù that was to come with the purchase. First they could not verify the order number and then after multiple back and forth emails, each demanding I do one more thing from submitting pictures of product to screen shots of order numbers to requiring the review on line.  I gave up. Happy to have the product and I use it regularly. I do recommend the product with the one caveat mentioned above.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2020
CommentsContent: We finally ditched our coffee maker for french press coffee. We were sick of warming our water up in the microwave, so I looked on Amazon and found this kettle. I researched a few different brands and this one had the most positive reviews. I'm glad I put the extra money in and bought this kettle. I love that it has the option to keep your water warm after boiling. The buttons are easy to read. It is absolutely fool-proof. The blue light is pleasant to look at while it heats your water. We air dry it after we are done. We have had zero issues thus far. I would 100% recommend this product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 6, 2021
CommentsContent: This is my first owned electric kettle and I have had it for a year now. I use it mainly for coffee. It has a good amount of temperature selections and heats the water fairly quickly. It has also come in handy for heating up water quick for a warm compress, just dumping water over a wash rag.  Nothing on it has failed or broken and we have used it multiple times a day on a daily basis. This is a great kettle!

CommentsTitle: Nice big kettle with temperature control
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I was looking for a bigger kettle with temperature control, as I like to drink white tea which is better with a slightly lower temperature steep than boilingI gave it a temperature a test, filling the kettle and then setting it to the white tea / 185 F mode. After the kettle was ready, I measured the temperature with my trusty Thermapen, and I was reading between 180.5-181.0 F (pictured). Not bad!Next I put it on the full boil mode and put the water into a very nice, rolling boil. The lights make it very clear if the kettle is heating or not (pictured).The kettle itself was packaged very well, which is important as a glass item. It was also easy to unpack and get running. The base includes a nifty cord wrap area (pictured), handy to keep the cord tidy or to put it into storage as needed.Overall I'm pleased with the product and hope to enjoy many teas from this kettle.

CommentsTitle: Best oolong tea I've ever had!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 17, 2021
CommentsContent: First things first, I am being paid to write this review. That being said, I bought this product with my own money, and I use it often. I love tea! And I hope to use this product for a long time. This kettle makes the best oolong tea I've ever had in my entire life! I really like that the electronic components on the outside of the bottom of the kettle are recessed above the bottom. That way I can put it in my sink and not worry about the electronics getting wet. I will say that for the green tea button seems to make my normal green tea a little bitter, so I normally use the delicate setting when making my green tea. The alarm that sounds when the water has reached the desired temperature, isn't loud enough to hear over music or from the next room. But I'm ok with that. I'd rather a quieter alarm than one that is too loud.  And the blue light while boiling is a nice touch. And I do think the kettle work better with room temp water, then with cold water. Lastly, it's not the kettles fault that I forget to press the start button sometime. lol

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I am very impressed with this product. I had one that I was using for several years and it finally died this year. I was specifically looking for one that was glass and metal with minimal plastic. I also like the temperature settings and how they are labeled for each type of tea. I like the blue light when it is running and that the base takes up minimal room. Auto shut off is great but I do wish it had an alarm of some sort. The only word of caution is that the markings on the side for quantity aren't correct. My french press holds 2 cups and the 2 cup line is much less water - this wasn't a deal breaker though.I've never taken the temperature of the water to say if it's exactly the correct temperature either but it's hot when it's done.The open button on the lid is slightly awkward and I can see how it would break easily. Also not a deal breaker for me.I searched fairly thoroughly since most of the reviews had something fairly negative on every brand. I have been very impressed after using this one now for a few months.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 16, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a great electric kettle. My favorite thing about it is that it has multiple temperature settings because I like to drink different types of tea. It heats up the water very fast. I have also used it to boil water to use for ramen cups and it works very well for that. I like that it has both an audio and a visual signal for when the water is done being heated. The keep warm feature is also very nice.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I have had this kettle for 30 days and now there is a Rust Pit in the bottom. The quality of Stainless Steel is poor. I will be making a warranty claim for exchange.

CommentsTitle: The best tea kettle I've ever had.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2020
CommentsContent: After researching for electric tea kettles I chose this one based on the six different temperature controls, automatic shut off, see-through glass with blue light while heating, and how wide the lid opens for cleaning. I made a great choice. The water boils so fast that I often use it when I need boiling water for cooking rather than wait for the water to boil on the stove. I highly recommend this kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2020
CommentsContent: My wife and I had an old electric kettle (about 5 years old) which began to malfunction.  As much as I loved the fact my old kettle kettle lasted this long, it stood out as a bit of an eyesore on our counter (made out of white, heatable plastic).  Additionally, I felt like the buildup of calcium/limescale) seemed to occur almost immediately with that older device.So far, the HadinEEon kettle has been amazing.  It does everything my other kettle used to do, but seems to be easier to clean and also has some awesome temperature control features that I love.  I use the "Keep Warm" function quite a bit when drinking more than 1 cup of tea.  And on top of it all, it actually looks much nicer in our kitchen.  Glad we purchased!

CommentsTitle: Dream of my wife came true
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 15, 2020
CommentsContent: My wife is a big tea drinker. And it's important to heat the water exactly the temperature the exact tea needs.
