I don't know how many kinds of tea there are in our kitchen, but she looks very satisfied every time I see her sipping her tea :)The kettle works perfectly, with a beautiful color (as you see on the photo) and a nice sound to inform the water is heated. Glass is an ideal solution for those who don't want to ingest any plastic particles and toxins (in case of plastic kettles), easy to clean (you see it right away through the glass), and enjoyable to watch while it's working. I wish a long life to our new kettle!

CommentsTitle: Put this kettle in the cart right now!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I have owned three electric kettles and discarded them before they broke because they just didn‚Äôt do the job. And two of them cost twice what I paid for the Hadin. Just last week I said to my wife (she‚Äôs the one who purchased this item) this was by far the best of them all. I‚Äôve measured the temperature stops with a cooking thermometer and each was within a single degree as indicated. The buttons are firm and easy to understand and the kettle fits snugly on the spindle. All in all this is a winner for the practical aspects along with the lights indicating the water is ready for pouring.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 21, 2019
CommentsContent: Bought this product primarily to take on vacations. I am a picky tea drinker. I have to have a good cup of tea in the morning to start my day. I needed a pot that would heat water quickly and most importantly to the proper temperature which is so important to enjoy a great cup of tea. When finished, I just give it a quick wipe inside and out. Having this pot with me to make tea ensures that I am not leaving my tea to chance by ordering a luke warm cup on the go. Nice product to use when you have lots of company too. Have only had the pot for about 2 months but have used it quite a bit. With proper care I don't see why it won't last a very long time. Happy with my choice.

CommentsTitle: AMAZING KETTLE, but kettle lid gets hot
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 1, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this kettle. The design is pretty and sleek, love the glass and blue led light when boiling water. I love the temperature control, keep warm function, and how it beeps with every click and when the boiling is done. THE KEEP WARM FUNCTION is especially amazing!! it helps so I don't have to reboil the water every time.However, one downside though, the lid of the kettle gets really hot, even from outside, after boiling water. This makes the button to open the lid really hot to touch too after boiling water. Perhaps a button that automatically props up the lid would be good too, for this one we have to press and hold the button and open the lid manually.However, this is just one minor thing. If you wait some time to open the lid after boiling, it should be fine.Overall, really great kettle!! Love it!! I love the packaging too, everything was really safe.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I've been using this daily to heat water for a french press.  Bought it a couple months ago and it has been great.  Checked the water temp with an instant read thermometer and it was right where it should be.My old method was a tea kettle on the stove, which required monitoring the water temp.  This is much more convenient, I can just turn it on and get breakfast ready while it holds at temp until I'm making coffee.It's nice, buy it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2019
CommentsContent: I'm very happy with this purchase.  I love the fact that I only need to push two buttons in order to get the temperature that I want and to get it to start up.  With other kettles, you have to push one button a few times in order to get the desired temperature.  I like the blue LED lights that are on while the water is warming up, it looks really nice.  Just remember that it's glass!  I accidentally tipped this kettle over, and had to buy another (totally my fault).All in all, great product!

CommentsTitle: It‚Äôs exactly what you hope it would be
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I like the blue light and little beeps it makes to tell me when the water is at the correct temperature. I like that it tells me what temp to brew what, like green tea vs coffee - they are best at different temperatures and I am all for being extra like that. It is a great size to make multiple cups of whatever: coffee, ramen, etc throughout the day. It doesn‚Äôt rust or at least it has not for me and I‚Äôve had this for a long while now. It doesn‚Äôt take up much counter space and I can easily store it away. It just looks good overall. I wanted something to give me hot water fast because I got tired of putting a kettle on the stove. I think this is one of my best kitchen appliances. It‚Äôs better than instant hot water at the sink because again I can pick the temperature I want it to be. Buy it. You won‚Äôt regret it.

CommentsTitle: Best Electric Kettle used so far
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 14, 2020
CommentsContent: So far this is the best electric kettle I have used.  I had used other brands, but this particular kettle that I like about is the variable temperature and the keep warm feature.  My previous electric kettle did not have the keep warm feature, so I had to turn on and off every time I need hot water.  I use this kettle to drink hot water for me and my family, also use the hot water for making hot tea, use the hot water to wash fresh vegetables, use hot water in cooking etc.  Many variety of uses.  Love this kettle and I recommend this Electric Kettle. Sam..

CommentsTitle: Great Electric Kettle for the price point
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 29, 2020
CommentsContent: After reading several electric kettles reviews online, I landed on this one due to the ratings, the different temperature controls, and the keep warm feature. I recently received it and it's already been a fantastic addition to my kitchen. Heats water quickly to the proper temperature for different types of tea, and boils quickly for oatmeal and other instant meals/soups. I should have purchased one of these years ago to step up my tea game!  Had green tea yesterday and with the temperature control it was the best cup of green tea I have had in a while. It's also easy to get your hand inside to wipe dry after use.  It's a bit bigger than expected, but that's okay - well worth the counter space!

CommentsTitle: Finally found a kettle that works the way it advertises!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this kettle. I bought one for myself, personally, to have in our master suite. After having it for a few weeks, I ended up buying it for my day spa. We have it sitting in our reception area. The best feature is that it kicks on and off to maintain a constant temperature. Being opened in our facility for eleven hours a day, every guest from the first to the last, can get a cup of tea at any time. It is very quick to heat up, usually in under three minutes depending on the temperature you choose. It was easy to set up and easy to figure out. Just make sure the only thing you are heating is water! You cannot heat up soup or apple cider in this, as it does not heat properly. I can tell you that during January, I was very sick. My husband made me Lipton cup of soup by just having the kettle on all day and pouring the heated water over the soup contents in my cup. He heated it on the highest setting (220), and the soup was softened in about a minute. I actually prefer this over the microwave.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 1, 2021
CommentsContent: This new Electric Kettle is just what I was looking for. I was using my microwave for heating the water and had to use measuring 2 cup measuring cup two different times. That took a total of 8 minutes. Now less than 4 minutes for a liter of water. Plus the added light effects and clear glass so you can see exactly when it begins to boil. Temperature added to assist on sensitive teas and other drinks.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I will get a free gift if I write this review, however I would like to inform you that is not the reason why I gave this kettle 5 stars. It has 6 different buttons for temperature options from 160-212 degrees F, a ‚ÄúKeep Warm‚Äù button and a ‚ÄúStart/Stop‚Äù button. I have not seen a kettle with all of these options packed in one kettle. If you are picky with your tea taste, this kettle is just for you. It is a little pricier than other kettles, but for the options and ease of cleaning I think it‚Äôs worth it. I have only used it once so far, I will update my review if something goes wrong in the future. If you press the highest temperature setting it take a little longer than other kettles I‚Äôve used, so if you are not in a rush to get your water boiled quickly, I definitely recommend this product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 4, 2020
CommentsContent: Heats 8 cups of water in just a few minutes and keeps it at selected temperature.  Generous size kettle with a nice substantial handle.  Compact base stores easily anywhere.  Several temperature settings cover the range from white, oolong, black teas and tisanes.  Generous cord length is also a nice feature.  I couldn‚Äôt ask for a nicer, more convenient unit.  I highly recommend this tea kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 24, 2020
CommentsContent: This was my first electric tea kettle, so I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect.  First of all the look of it is very sleek and it feels very solid. I really like how the plug is a base that the kettle sits on and not attached to it. It took less than 7 minutes to heat the max capacity to the hottest setting... and the keep warm feature is pretty amazing. I work at home these days so getting into the kitchen and being able to make tea with already warm water is great!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2020
CommentsContent: This was a gift for my lady. She's a daily tea drinker and thought this would be a great for boiling water. She likes all of the features, especially the keep warm setting. Which does keep the water warm at set temperature for the suggested time. I naturally like the pretty blue lights as the water boils. The simple things in life. Thinking about getting one, don't hesitate. The kettle does separate from the base for serving and light cleaning of the kettle.

CommentsTitle: Looks beautiful and amazing temp control
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Great product. My first electric kettle with temperature control and I absolutely love it. I can brew all my different teas properly now and make a perfect cup of coffee at the perfect temperature.It also looks amazing on the counter too. The blue light looks so pleasing as well, makes me want to stare at it during the whole boiling process. It does boil a little slower than my previous ones, but that's okay cause of the temp control.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely love the temperature controls on this kettle! They work so well and help to create a great cup of tea. The kettle is a very good size and can easily make tea for a few people. The blue color makes it look so nice when it's on. But, I think my favorite feature is the keep warm option! I can set it, go do my makeup or make lunch for the day and not worry about my water getting cold.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2021
CommentsContent: Was very pleased with it until the first time I boiled half white vinegar and half water in it to clean it - as directed.  For some reason the temperature control changed.  Where I used to use the 175 degree temp for my green tea, now I have to use the 195 degree temp.  It's a simple fix, just changed which button I push.  Just puzzled by it.  Other than that I love the speed and convenience.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 30, 2019
CommentsContent: I love this tea kettle. It heats up very fast and keeps hot unto 12 hours. The blue led light tells you it‚Äôs on and starting to boil. You can hardly hear the boiling noise.  As other kettles it shuts off automatically when done.I am a big fan of tea and coffee. The best thing I like this kettle is I can set the temperature for my teas. I do not need to boil water and let it cool down to get the right temperature for my tea. Best kettle I ever had.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 3, 2019
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this kettle! The temperature controls allow you to brew the perfect cup of tea every time and most importantly it‚Äôs sturdy and well made.

CommentsTitle: Great water kettler - love the variable temps!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this kettle. Got it to be able to vary the temperature for the different teas and coffee we drink and it works great. It makes a really big difference for green tea - it keeps our favorite matcha from burning. My husband and I use it daily and we really like the "keep warm" feature, so when one of us heats up water for tea, the other person can still have hot water ready some time later. We liked it so much, I got a second one for my parents for Christmas and they've been enjoying theirs as well. I like that it's glass, easy to see when it needs cleaning, and I like that it lights up blue when it's working, just like my old kettle (which, unfortunately, didn't have the various temps and keep warm features).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 14, 2019
CommentsContent: This thing does a great job.  Heats water quickly and efficiently.  Seems to be well made.  Was pleasantly surprised at the quality.  I like how the carafe fits on to the base and is easy to remove.  Has a built in filter/screen at the spout.  That would come in handy if you had lose tea or coffee in the carafe.  Would keep them from coming out.  The filter is also removable for cleaning.Only down side is the short electric cord.  It‚Äôs only about 5 inches long and you will have to use an extension cord with this item.  Wish they had made it longer.Other than that, I would definitely recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I wanted to buy a second electric kettle so that I could brew tea at home and at work. My previous electric kettle is also variable temperature, which for me is a must! It makes brewing different teas so much easier than when I used to guesstimate the temperature with a stove top kettle. This one brews just a little bit slower than my other one BUT it is also much quieter. My family used to joke that my old one sounded like a jet plane taking off in the house! I appreciate that it is not as loud.I also love the tempered glass, and as others have stated it is quite fun to watch your water heat up! The blue light stays on until it reaches the desired temperature. Then, the light turns off and it beeps to let you know that your water is ready. Additionally, cleaning is a lot easier because the lid is wide enough to wipe the bottom of the kettle, and I believe that the filter can be removed and washed as well. Love

CommentsTitle: This Kettle Will Make YOU Whistle!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 2, 2020
CommentsContent: We purchased the HadinEEon Variable Temperature Electric Kettle in February of this year (2020).  It was an instant hit, and the honeymoon is not over, as of June 2020.  The separate, individualized temperature settings for various purposes and products (green tea, black tea, boiling, etc.) are very handy and allow for specificity, something you don't usually find in electric kettles or hotpots.  Clear glass with well-defined markings makes it simple for users to see how much water remains and what needs to be added to fill 'er up.  The "keep on" reheating feature is handy for those who might forget they set it to heat for a cuppa and get distracted, wandering back to the pot later.  Users will find a kettle that is ready for action, not cold water in need of an extended warmup.  Highly recommended!

CommentsTitle: Very pleased with this electric kettle
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I had previously owned an electric kettle that was metal and I was not able to see through the walls of the kettle. I prefer being able to see the water in the kettle so I started searching for a glass kettle. My mother in law owns this kettle and I LOVED using while I was at their house. I took a picture of their kettle to make sure I bought the correct one. This kettle is awesome. It heats water so quickly. I love that it will reheat or hold the water at the desired temperature in cases where I step out of the kitchen for a minute and forget about the water. I love the flexibility in temperature choices because I enjoy drinking a variety of different teas. There is nothing about this kettle that I dislike. Also, my mother in law‚Äôs kettle is well over a year old (and that‚Äôs only as long as i can remember) and still operates beautifully. Would definitely recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I had another electric tea kettle prior to this one and I liked it but every time I lifted the kettle off of the plate, I had to reset the temperature.  This tea kettle doesn't need me to do anything once I choose my temperature setting and it keeps it at that temperature no matter how many times I lift it off and refill my cup.  It is amazing.  It also gives me a signal when it is at the perfect temperature.  It is fabulous.  My favorite.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2020
CommentsContent: This is the best of the three electric kettles I have owned. My very first kettle was a gift from my marvelous friend and mentor Doris.  I still love it, stainless steel, single temp., so very fast, inspiring the whole family of the importance of having an electric kettle.  It made it‚Äôs way to camp, and decided to live there.  The second kettle was porcelain with variable temperature.  Great, a bit heavy, a little slower,  but had a short life span (perhaps missing the boil-dry feature of this one, but don‚Äôt want to fault the kettle or paint it black for that matter).Love this easy to clean, wide open lid mouth with the built in water screen spout.  The only small issue found is that my husband cannot hear the temperature reached tone; but because of the blue light in this transparent glass kettle feature, it is easy to see that the kettle has come to temperature.  Wonderful kettle - we are so pleased with it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 28, 2020
CommentsContent: IT heats that water up faster than a pot, or at least it seems to. This is out second kettle, and first glass one. I was a little concerned about it being glass rather than metal, but it feels pretty sturdy so that concern was put to rest. We are now really digging the glass because it's cooler to the touch after it stop heating than the metal one, looks nicer, and is much cleaner looking.

CommentsTitle: Ordered this December of Last Year
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 12, 2020
CommentsContent: I've had this HadinEEon Kettle Since December of last year. The kettle looks and heats as it did when i first received it in the mail. The various settings are great! If you are a fan of traditional loose leaf tea, or a regular tea bag.. this works amazingly well with all of the various temperature settings.The light feature is an added bonus which makes it easier to see the liquid as well as know when the kettle is done heating.If you need an electric kettle that heats fast, works well, remains good quality after months of heavy use.. i would get this one.Future recommendations for product improvement:I would make the light turn from blue to red based on how hot the water is.Longer power cord option.

CommentsTitle: Very fast and temperature works great.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 29, 2019
CommentsContent: This product brings water to the desired temperature very fast and the temperature control actually works. If you select 200 degree water that is what you get!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I cannot recommend this kettle highly enough. First of all, the design is very modern, and the blue lighting as it boils makes it seem like the pinnacle of style. The variable temperature heating is fantastic for heating water to optimal temperatures for various teas. And I would never buy a kettle again without the reheat function. The kettle also boils down exceptionally fast. At least twice as fast as my last kettle. It lets you know it‚Äôs Boiled with a polite ‚Äúping‚Äù. If you are a serious tea drinker, this kettle is for you. And be prepared for all the complements on your stylish kettle!

CommentsTitle: Perfect Classy Quality variable electric kettle
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2020
CommentsContent: This tea kettle works great and looks fabulous on the counter. I like that I can choose different temperatures so that I don't burn my tongue on super hot water. It also allows you to keep the water at the chosen temperature for up to 12 hours.  The auto shut off is super important to me-even on the stay warm setting. Lots of safety features so that if the kettle goes dry it shuts off. One of my favorite things about the kettle is that the cord wraps itself up under the base and has a small exit so that it sits flat and you can have the cord short or longer. I love this because I hate to have cords laying all over my counter. Love the blue light too. Received this as part of a promotion, but that doesn't matter, this is a great kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 17, 2020
CommentsContent: We use our Kettle daily, our last kettle failed about 15 months after buying it, so we decided to try this one from Amazon. It is a highly rated product on amazon and decided to give it a try.Great product, but it does take longer to heat up than my old kettle, BUT it has a lot more features (like keep cool, select temperature for various uses, etc. )We use it for making breakfast for our kiddo and it allows us to use a lower temp feature vs trying to cool his oatmeal. I would highly recommend this kettle.

CommentsTitle: Great teapot/water boiler. Just remember, IT'S GLASS.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 29, 2020
CommentsContent: Had to review because this was the best hot water pot I found, in terms of aesthetics, multiple temperature settings, and value. Unfortunately I had to get another type without those features, as a bottle of spices fell on it from the cabinet above, and BROKE the thing. I was disappointed, more in myself than anything - after all, it WAS made of GLASS - but ended up with a simpler yet unbreakable model.

CommentsTitle: This kettle is the best-kids' hot chocolate is perfect, versatile, easy to clean
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 29, 2021
CommentsContent: I hesitated between a few kettles of more well known brands from other stores but I am sooooo happy I got this one! I love that it is on a base that's easy and lets me know that it is connected. Blue--like a light show. It's well made and opens nice and wide unlike others so I get water from my fridge filler. My FAVORITE is that it had a low setting--perfect for my kids' hot chocolates. They make it themselves. Looking forward to the French press temperature for coffee with guests this weekend. I was hesitant to buy 1 more thing for the counter but this is worth it. We drink more tea now in the cold weather, so we can experiment with different teas and temperatures easily!! I'm thankful for that helpful manual.  A durable, versatile, great kettle! Worth every penny!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 24, 2019
CommentsContent: This heats up water for my husband's french press in less than half the time of the microwave - and it keeps it hot. We ended up buying two, one for work and one for home (we work at a school). It makes so much hot water so fast, and without a stove or microwave needed, that we can take the home one to work, use the two of them, fill and heat them, and have a hot chocolate day for an entire class. Woohoo!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 15, 2020
CommentsContent: I was delighted to receive this electric Tea Kettle.  It boils the water very fast and I especially love to be able to select the temperature that is appropriate for the tea I am steeping!  Love the blue LED and it looks nice on my counter.  Took a while to pick the tea kettle I thought would work best for my needs and I am more than happy with the one this one!  Thanks for an awesome electric tea kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2019
CommentsContent: I ordered this for my office - it's amazing!¬† I love that I can see the water volume so it's easy to refill, has pretty blue lights when heating, has lots of different options for temperatures according to what tea is being used, a warmer, and does not ever boil dry.¬† It is used constantly throughout the day and gets heavy use and is durable and works so well.¬† I love it!¬† ¬†In addition to its functionality, it is sleek and pretty and looks so nice.¬† Five stars for this amazing product!

CommentsTitle: Only regret is not purchasing sooner
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 31, 2021
CommentsContent: I am a huge whole leaf tea snob. I have spent quite a bit of money on various quality teas but somehow never put the money into buying an electric kettle. I was still boiling my water in a kettle on the stove and then letting it cool to the appropriate temperature for green and white teas (!) I finally decided to treat myself and purchase this electric kettle after considering my particular desires - a glass kettle, one with multiple temperature selections, at least 6 cup capacity as that is the size of my largest teapot, and an ability to keep warm.  I didn't realize how often I would pass up a cup just because it seemed like too much work to heat the water up on the stove. This kettle heats to boiling in minutes and is so simple and easy to use. I am considering buying another for my workplace.I am receiving a gift card for posting this review but I honestly would have said exactly this without any compensation because it's absolutely true.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 29, 2020
CommentsContent: As a tea lover I need a good kettle. This one is the best. Several temperature options give you the choice if you are making herbal tea or black tea and many more. I've had it almost 3 months and I am satisfied with the quality. I would recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 22, 2021
CommentsContent: I purchased this kettle over other options because the keep-warm feature lasts for 4 hours instead of only 30 minutes, which is a common time length in electric kettles. Also the lid opens to a full 90 degrees, which is easier for cleaning purposes. It‚Äôs a good size and the blue light doesn‚Äôt annoy my eyes, which I was concerned about before purchasing.I didn‚Äôt need the ability to adjust temperatures to exact degrees, so the 6 or so presets are sufficient for my needs. (I have not tested the temp levels with an outside thermometer, other reviewers have done).However the cord to the base is very short and I would give it 4.5 stars on that basis.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2020
CommentsContent: I love that this kettle tell me the correct temperature for every type of tea. I can finally enjoy a variety of teas as they were meant to be enjoyed. Turns out green tea is a lot less bitter when you brew it at lower temperatures!Keep warm feature is really great, because I consume 3 cups of tea throughout my morning and I know the water will always be ready for another cup!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I‚Äôve had this kettle since March now and I love it. I use it every day at least 3-4 times and it works great. The water heats quickly and the item needs very little cleanup. I chose this kettle because it was glass and I like to make sure it‚Äôs always filled to wherever I need it. I also think the glass helps with the cleanliness of the product. With other stainless kettles I found myself scaling all the time.

CommentsTitle: Fast heating. Love the stay warm option.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 11, 2020
CommentsContent: Got this kettle as a birthday present. I‚Äôm used to boiling water in a small pan on the stove anytime I want tea or noodles and it gets so tiresome. Now I don‚Äôt have to. In this kettle the water heats up very quickly. I love the stay warm feature because I often forget that I‚Äôve boiled water for a bit before I‚Äôm ready to use it. It‚Äôs got a wide mouth so it‚Äôs easy to clean. My only complaint is I wish the beep that indicated the water is ready was louder. I can‚Äôt really hear it unless I‚Äôm in the kitchen.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 31, 2020
CommentsContent: The product is very cool.  I ordered it in order to make coffee in the morning and I ended up making coffee multiple times a day.What makes this product excellent and what I like the most about it:-- Multiple temperature controls: I can control the heat level of the water.  For coffee which I make with faucet water I use the maximum temperature control.  If the water was already boiled before, I set it to other control to make the water hot faster-- Blue light: I like the design of the kettle and the blue light that shines when the water gets heated.-- Overall product: Product is relatively light in weight and easy to clean.  I just rinse it with water and let it dry.  Water boils in around 5-7 minutes on maximum temperature controlOverall excellent product.

CommentsTitle: Works great, Light weight, easy to clean
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2020
CommentsContent: I drink both coffee and tea every morning.  We had a more expensive stainless steel electric kettle which was terrible to clean inside and often overflowed when boiling.  With the new clear glass kettle it is easy to see how much water is in the pot and very easy to clean.  The variable temperatures make every type of tea perfect.  It heats quickly and is in use every day.  I highly recommend it!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I‚Äôve had this kettle for a few weeks now and I‚Äôm fully satisfied with how it functions. The best thing for me is the capacity, as I usually can fill the French press and tea pot with one kettle full which means I‚Äôm using less electricity. The keep hot facility is aSo great because it means that you don‚Äôt have to sit over the kettle to catch it at the right temperature. I can put it on before I take my shower and it stays hot long enough that I can make my morning coffee without reboiling. Again, saving energy.It‚Äôs a sturdy and appealing design. I don‚Äôt have much use for all the different settings, but I suppose if I were a major tea drinker it might make a difference? I‚Äôm not convinced.  Overall, it meets my needs and functions in the way I had hoped. So far, I‚Äôm a very happy customer!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 31, 2021
CommentsContent: we love being able to control the temp for our french press coffee and various teas. at first, i hoped to heat milk in this for hot chocolate, but the soy milk burned a bit on the bottom. so we stopped doing that. the best way we have found to clean it is to fill about a liter of ice and white vinegar. then periodically swirl the liquid around until the ice melts and dump it out. love the sleek design and look of this kettle!!

CommentsTitle: Right water heater for daily use
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 6, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this water heater for multiple reasons.1. Its lid opens up at 90 degree angle.2. Its filter mesh can be removed for cleaning3. It has multiple temperature settings.It worked excellent on all these parameters and would recommend this product. Two things though, I wished this had was 1. to have a lower temperature setting as well. Its temperature setting starts at 160 F. My daily use is to drink lukewarm water. So, a temperature setting of 80 degrees or 100 F would have been much useful. 2. It does not seem to remember the last temperature setting that I had chosen. It always start with 212 F.  This is I believe because it does not have any internal battery memory to save the last user state.Overall a good product! I would have given it a 4.5 star, given an option.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 25, 2019
CommentsContent: I love this electric tea kettle! What is great about it compared to others is that there are selections on how hot you want the water. As a tea drinker, water temp is important and just using a regular kettle or the microwave doesn't give you that flexibility. You don't want to overheat your green tea to bitterness nor do you not want to get all the flavor of your black tea if not hot enough. This kettle takes all the guesswork out of that. It heats fast and has been very reliable. I have seen similar electric kettles for double the price - you are paying for the name. LOL. I also use it to heat water for my instant soups and oatmeal. This is a great buy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 12, 2020
CommentsContent: For me this product is excellent. I had bought this product to replace a old one and am very pleased. It has pre sets for certain drinks and a keep warm function. If you have any questions on how to operate and set for certain teas the instructions are included. It is a nice large size. It even gives you pre cleaning instructions and lime build up cleaning instructions with one free pack. I also like how the cord can be hidden under the pad when not in use.

CommentsTitle: Great Water Heater for Teas, coffee and other uses.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2021
CommentsContent: The unit has a temperature control system so that your tea or other items get the exact temperature needed for a perfect brew.  I used it for instant coffee, various types of teas and even to make some instant soups.The best feature is that it will keep re-heating your water all day if you want.Love it and my wife loves, as she is the person for whom I purchased it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I owned the previous generation of this kettle and used it nearly everyday for almost two years and I loved it - that is until I dropped it!  Had they sold the same model, I would have bought it again, but they were only selling this upgraded versions with a lot more bells and whistles.  I've been using this for several weeks and it works flawlessly and I highly recommend this if you are in the market for an electric kettle!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 16, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this as an upgrade from my old electric kettle and I am very satisfied with it.  Nothing about it feels flimsy and it boils water quickly and reliably.  I use it daily to boil the water for our household iced tea habit, so I only tend to use the maximum temperature setting.  I did test some of the lower settings out with my IR thermometer for fun and the kettle was pretty accurate.  Having a glass carafe is a definite upgrade from my old kettle as I no longer have to guess what the water inside the kettle is doing at any given moment.  Plus, the LED light that illuminates the water gives it a bit of a lava lamp effect.  I also like the feature that will hold the set temperature once the water heats up so I don't have to repeat the boiling process if I get distracted before it finishes.  I would definitely buy this again.

CommentsTitle: Great features! Clear, multi temp, auto shut off
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 22, 2020
CommentsContent: The kettle works exactly as described.  I like that I can select the temperature I want, see the water boil and the large capacity.  I also like that it shuts off automatically.  My last kettle would turn on again and Beep at me.  However I am not a fan of the part in the directions that say to empty the kettle and unplug the unit after use.  I hope this doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs going to break because water gets left in the unit.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 21, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a nice looking kettle that is, overall, quite and really attractive with the blue lights that are on while it's boiling. We like the different temperature control options and really like that we can keep it warm while we are doing other things but still want some hot water for the "never ending cup of tea" that is our norm. So far, the quality looks good as we have experienced no issues with the lid or other working parts. If you're in the market for an electric kettle, this is probably the one for you.

CommentsTitle: Perfect for controlling your water temp!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 26, 2021
CommentsContent: I am a coffee nerd. Making a good brew depends on multiple factors especially when using a French Press or pour over. This kettle allows me to get the water to the perfect temperature and hold it there if needed. I've measured the temp with a thermometer and it is spot on.  It takes a little longer to get to your desired temp - as the kettle starts and stops on its way so as not to overheat. But I've worked out how long the stages are and manage that as part of my brewing approach. Going to a boil takes less time. It's an attractive kettle - the glass is lovely but it does show the build up of limescale! I live in a hard water area. But it's easy to clean and bring back to its full glory. The boil noise is fine - a little louder than most but no big deal. There are plenty of other things in the kitchen which make more noise! I'd buy again - a few months in it's going strong.

CommentsTitle: The most functional and aesthetically-pleasing kettle with a 3-year warranty!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 19, 2021
CommentsContent: This is definitely the best electric kettle you can get. It combines high tech and functionality seamlessly. The kettle heats water precisely to the preset temperatures on the buttons and the keep warm function is a very handy feature. The 2.0L high capacity glass makes it great for all uses especially when you have a large number of guests. The blue LED light is a very nice touch of sophistication as it sets itself apart from the rest of any appliance. When the unit boils water you just want to look at it as it is a beautiful unit as it is functional. I couldn't be happier with my purchase. I highly recommend this unit. With a 3-year warranty (which no other manufacturer offers, as far as I know) you should have a piece of mind drinking many cups of tea for the next few years as I do.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 9, 2020
CommentsContent: Living alone, I would typically heat up water (for myself) in the microwave. While visiting my sister overseas, I got to experience the luxury of an electric kettle. As soon as I got home, I started looking around on Amazon for one. Not only is it faster to heat up a small amount of water for a cup of tea, it is MUCH faster to heat up a larger amount of water. This kettle is great because you can select the temperature to match your preferred tea (or other drink). The blue light is icing on the cake. I'm very happy with the purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 5, 2020
CommentsContent: One of the reasons I purchased this unit was there is a stay warm function. This function is supposed to keep the water at the correct temperature as long as the kettle is placed back on the heater within 20 seconds. I have poured water out of the kettle and put the kettle back immediately and it doesn't keep the stay warm on. I did see that this function only works after the kettle has fully heated, which I waited for.Also the notification that the kettle is to temperature is very quiet and very hard to hear.Overall the kettle does heat water and it does hold the temperature when the stay warm function is working, but it isn't reliable enough compared to other brands.UPDATED REVIEW:I was provided with a new kettle after writing the review. The new kettle works as advertised and the company was very supportive of their warranty and product.

CommentsTitle: Works great! Heats water quickly at preset temperature. But lettering is fading after 5 mos.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 13, 2020
CommentsContent: This product works as advertised. There are 6 temperature settings that you can choose from and it'll beep when the water has reached the desired temperature and shutoff. It'll also continuously keep the water at the desired temperature if you hit the `hold` button which is useful if u want to keep the water at the desired temperature for a long time. I also liked the feature where you can take it out of the base and put it back in and it'll retain the hold setting (as long as you put it back within a reasonable amount of time).My pet peeves with this are:1) The lid is a little hard to close as you need to exert some effort to close it. There's no soft or easy close feature2) After 5 months of near-daily use, the lettering is starting rub off and fade, in particular, the start/stop and the hold buttons

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I have to give an update on this review. The company reached out to me to try and rectify my issues with this kettle. I was sent replacement kettles that unfortunately didn‚Äôt work out for me, but once I let them know that, they sent me a refund by Amazon gift card. Their customer service did go above and beyond to make things right with me, and that makes all the difference in the world!I‚Äôm sorry, I think this is a terrible kettle! The handle is too hot to touch when the water turns off, so you have to give it a few before touching. It leaks water on to my countertop every time I pour my water out. It creates water spots at the bottom of the kettle that you can‚Äôt clean out, then it flakes off into the water you boil and goes into your drink. I wanted to love this, but for the price this is terrible!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 15, 2020
CommentsContent: I am skeptical by nature.  I ALWAYS prepare to be at least a little disappointed in my purchases.  The HadinEEon Variable Temperature Electric Kettle exceeded my wildest hopes. It's perfect to make pour over gourmet coffee or a wonderful cup of tea.  An added plus is it looks good and is very well designed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 17, 2020

Highly recommend, for yourself or even a nice gift for someone! Definitely an upgrade from the usual kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 12, 2020

CommentsTitle: Clear view of boiling water with great warmer function
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 25, 2020

It has a wide mouth to it makes it easy to reach a clean inside. I use it numerous times every day to make tea.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2020
CommentsContent: This variable temperature kettle is a must have for every kitchen, office or dorm. I‚Äôm both an instant coffee drinker and a tea drinker. The included manual provides recommendations for temperature selections for selection of teas consumed on a regular basis.  The LED light easily identifies when kettle is in operation and the beep confirms when done. Appropriate for large or small batches. With the 12 hour keep warm, you can enjoy beverage throughout the day, or for pulling an all night studying. Overall excellent product, very easy to use, very functional and a must have for all kitchens, offices or dorms.

CommentsTitle: Quick boil, and easy to pour.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 25, 2020
CommentsContent: It‚Äôs working great so far I do hope it lasts! Heats literally in seconds you see bubbles and within 5 mins bam roaring boiling water I almost look at it with astonishment! I do recommend this item! I‚Äôm also writing this because I got a little card in my box that lets me pick one of six items free if I write a review and wondering how true that is! I would recommend my family of four really loves this item so far!

CommentsTitle: Does not work as advertised. Seller sent new kettle.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 17, 2020
CommentsContent: Update: After my review the seller contacted me and sent a new version of the kettle, free of charge, which works.This heats water but the notification beeps don't sound and the keep warm/memory function does not work.If I just wanted to heat water I would have purchased a much less expensive kettle. I paid extra for this hoping for the extra features, especially the keep warm feature.I am suspicious of all the positive reviews within a short time period, like another reviewer mentioned.I am returning this.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 3, 2021
CommentsContent: Don‚Äôt buy, not worth the money. I had this electric kettle for three months before it started acting up. It would randomly turn on through out the day but not when you wanted it to. After a few weeks it worked fine for two months and now it won‚Äôt start at all. I bought in October and officially took a crap in January. I‚Äôve had Walmart brands work longer. Super disappointed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 24, 2019
CommentsContent: I LOVE THIS KETTLE!! I purchased some delicate teas that needed to be steeped at lower temperatures, so I went on the hunt for a temperature control kettle. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I really like the electric tea kettle overall. It works really well, heats quickly, and maintain the temperature, if you select the maintain temperature option. I love the various temperature options, which are identified by the type of tea as well. I did a lot of research and comparing before purchasing this teapot, I believe I made a solid choice.I highly recommend this product for the price, quality of the pot, and options - Its a great choice.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 16, 2021
CommentsContent: I bought this as a gift for my daughter-in-law. She and my son loves it. My son uses this for his french coffee press. She uses it for tea.  It is very convenient to be able to walk away from it and come back to the exact temp you set it for.  They threw away their tea kettle. She has a friend from England and she said that this was a good brand. I should have got me one.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 23, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle is replacing an old one I had and I can‚Äôt believe I waited and used that inferior kettle so long. Water level is right there - no peering through the side to see how much water is in there. Blue light is bright and let‚Äôs you know the kettle is working. Lots of temperatures to choose from, depending on they type of tea you‚Äôre using. My old one had off or boil. How did I live without this?

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this kettle after the previous one, by Hamilton Beach Co, broke after less than a year of use (the buttons just stopped responding). I was worrying about the same problem happening with HadinEEon one, but so far no problems after several months of use. I liked the large capacity: it is 2 liter compared to 1.8 most companies, including Hamilton Beach, offer‚Äîexactly what I needed to fill the thermos I use; the previous one was just little bit not enough and I had to boil water twice to fill the thermos. I slightly do not like that the opening clip is located on the lid, rather than a there would be a button to open it. But that is a minor inconvenience. Also shut off time after it starts boiling is little longer than with Hamilton Beach, but definitely not the 4 minutes mentioned in one of the reviews I saw (about 15- 30 seconds depending on the amount of water).  I would definitely recommend it.

CommentsTitle: Best kettle we have ever had. Get it!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 28, 2021
CommentsContent: This is the best kettle we have ever had and our kettle get a lot of wear and tear given that they are used at least twice a day plus all the amazing features at such a good value. Many kettles have been made cheaply and do things like not heating up fast, rust, get discolored but this does none of those the boil speed is like 3 times faster than our old one and is not not super loud.I‚Äôm always cautions getting products especially from online but I can tell you. You will not regret getting this kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Had this kettle for a few months now and I really enjoy the various heat settings. Heat output is true to the listed button temperature. Something I noticed about my kettle, not sure if this is for all, but some of the temperature buttons spaz a bit and don't shut off on their own. I would select a heat setting, press start (not the "keep warm" button), and then the kettle would boil several times until I would shut it off. Other than that glitch, I do enjoy this kettle.----------Edit: EXCELLENT customer service. Went out of their way to make sure this minor technicality was resolved. Highly recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I have been a long time tea drinker and foolishly had been using a standard kettle all of these years. My standard kettle was on its last legs and after doing research I realized that in order to make my tea taste even better, I should go with a temperature control kettle. I found this one with many good reviews and purchased it right away.So far, it has been excellent. I love the keep warm feature as I usually have 2 cups of tea in the morning, so it saves me time instead of having to wait for another cup to boil. (The initial boil is also a lot faster than my standard kettle!) The temperature settings work great. I have some special green tea I got recently and I feel that it tasted  better after using the exact temperature setting. I haven't used this for cooking yet, but I think that t will prove very useful when I need to boil a large amount of water quickly.Definitely worth it and so much less money than other temperature control kettles!

CommentsTitle: I love my new electric kettle!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2021
CommentsContent: First of all, I love the look of this electric kettle. I was looking for one that would help making tea easier since I don't love microwaving my water and don't like waiting for my water to boil on the stove. With this kettle, I can set the temperature and let it do it's thing! It is very sleek looking and I love the blue light that appears when it is heating up the water. I have yet to try any settings other than the Green and white tea settings for green, herbal, and fruit teas but I'm excited to eventually try the French Press option at some point! I like the auto shut off feature as well so you don't have to remember to turn it off and just have to remember to turn on the "Keep Warm" option if you want the water to stay hot. Based on looks and performance, this kettle is definitely worth the purchase! I've only had it since Christmas but I am confident that it will hold up against the test of time!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2020
CommentsContent: After doing some research, this electric kettle model had the best overall rating for my price range, so I decided to test it out. I am in love! I've had this kettle for two months now and use it every single day. This unit has the ideal temperature programmed for six different tea types (black, green, herbal, etc.). It just takes a couple minutes to reach the selected temperature, and then the unit will keep the water warmed to the ideal temp for up to four hours with the "keep warm" option. It does not give off nearly as much heat as a traditional stovetop kettle. While it does get hot, it is also safe to touch - you will not get burned if you bump it. Easy to rinse, change, and reconnect the kettle. Would definitely recommend!

CommentsTitle: Solid design and even a bit pretty to look at!

Feels very solid.  Heavy enough so it would not be easy to knock it over but not so heavy I can't handle it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 19, 2020
CommentsContent: When it worked it worked great. But considering I had it less than 30 days and it stopped working is insane. My last electric kettle lasted 3 years and still works! Returned and replaced with another brand instead of attempting to get a replacement.

CommentsTitle: Great replacement from my Chantal pot
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 5, 2020
CommentsContent: We have been using a $100 Chantal stove top tea kettle for years. However I decided I wanted something electric that I could set-and-forget with the temp and start doing the process of making my morning French Press. Getting the temperature right is a big deal for me, as I like my coffee to be made right (which is why I use a French Press LOL).  The HadinEEon Variable Temperature Electric Kettle is great for my purposes and suits my tea-making wife as well with all the other temp for teas also build into the options. Plus my wife loves the blue hues when the pot is on, it's totally cool and totally "pretty."  And it looks great just sitting there on the counter. Get this kettle, you'll love it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 26, 2019
CommentsContent: This is one great product! It takes less than 10 minutes to boil the max. 2 L of water. The design is very elegant and the quality of the kettle feels top notch. The keep warm feature is very handy when we have friends over for tea or coffee and chat. We will always have the water ready at the right temperature without having to run back and forth to the kitchen to boil more! However, the pot, being glass, probably is less energy efficient for keeping warm for long period of time than our traditional insulated water heater, but it is perfect for a short time. Therefore, we will stick to using it for making tea and coffee, particularly when having guests.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2020

I also drink various teas, this pot has 6 different heating levels so my delicate green or white ginger teas don‚Äôt burn and turn bitter and the higher temp is great for my Darjeeling and other black teas.  Steeping your teas at the proper temps make such a big taste difference.  And it‚Äôs pretty, not a deal breaker but I like that it looks nice sitting on the counter.

CommentsTitle: takes less time and love the blue light

There is a setting for that.  And I know when the blue light goes out it is tea time!  Great purchase.

CommentsTitle: A few days in and loving it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 25, 2021

CommentsTitle: This tea kettle changed my life!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2020

I also appreciate the larger size when entertaining, as I do often.. I‚Äôm very impressed with the temperature settings. CommentsTitle: The best investment for Electric Tea Kettle

CommentsContent: I purchased this Electric Tea Kettle in August just as I was moving into my new apartment.  I wanted to give it time to see if it lived up to all the other reviews. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 2, 2020

The company has emailed me and there should be a beep. They have been overly generous and helpful and offered to replace and make it right! They reached out two times and I would def buy from them again!  I have changed my stars to 5 stars because any company going above and beyond to make it right deserves business :)

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 4, 2020
CommentsContent: I rarely write reviews but I had to write one for this electric kettle. After reading many reviews prior to my purchase, this was the best. It didn‚Äôt disappoint! This kettle is so beautiful and the blue light is a bonus. It‚Äôs so nice and I‚Äôm so happy with my purchase. It boils water so fast and automatically turns off so I can set it and just walk away. It‚Äôs so ideal for my morning coffee and my all-day teas. I highly recommend this kettle!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle is larger than I really needed but the ability to heat to the perfect temperature and maintain it is a nice feature. CommentsTitle: Nice-looking electric kettle that works well; really like the keep-warm feature
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 7, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this kettle because my husband and I drink mate (yerba mate) everyday and we like the water to be a specific temperature, so the temperature control was a key feature for us. I particularly like the "keep warm feature", because I often walk away or start doing something else after starting the kettle, so I don't have to worry about the water losing heat. We also like that it is not very bulky, which is good as we don't have much counter space. One small criticism is that the volume markings are inaccurate, so 2 cups are more like 1.5 cups, but this is no big deal for me. Overall, I recommend this kettle!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2020
CommentsContent: We purchased this electric kettle a few months ago and have loved the ease of heating water to various temperatures and doing so quickly since then! Boiling water on the stove in a kettle takes a lot longer and its harder to know if its the right temperature for our various kinds of teas. I love the added feature of the lights while it is heating up and the measurements on the outside of the kettle to help me know how much water to boil for any given mug or travel cup. My only issue is that the bottom is starting to show some white staining, presumably from minerals in our tap water. Not sure how to get these deposits out, but haven't had an issue related to it. Really great electric kettle!UPDATE: The company contacted me with information about how to clean the build-up on my kettle. Very helpful and great customer service!

CommentsTitle: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS KETTLE FOR PERFECT FRENCH PRESS COFFEE!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2020
CommentsContent: I received a french press coffee pot for Christmas.  Try as I might, I could never get the temperature consistent on my own. I love the individual buttons for different teas and french press coffee.  I have only used the coffee mode, but my daughter has used it for tea.  We are both so happy!  The kettle heats up quickly and the "Keep Warm" button keeps the water at the perfect temp for multiple cups of tea/pots of coffee.  The lights are beautiful and the ready "beeps" are very subtle so as not to wake everyone in the house!  I couldn't be happier with my purchase.  Thank you HadinEEon for such a wonderful product!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2021
CommentsContent: This kettle is usable but I do not like it. Too many buttons and the main "turn on" button is too close to the "keep warm" button. This is a serious design error. Reliability is not good. I do not recommend it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 17, 2021
CommentsContent: This is a beautiful looking piece of equipment the gentle blue light is just calming in your kitchen. The pot itself works outstanding ,The controls are great the selections of temperatures also the keep warm cycle and how recycles back to your temperature for four hours amazing! I would recommend this to a friend matter of fact I have my Pastor come over and he was so impressed that he bought one! Great product outstanding price and value I give this five stars all across-the-board and heating takes about seven minutes for about a full pot of  Water. If you‚Äôre looking for a kettle for your French press coffee or for your cheese or for your oatmeal look no further this is the one and a three-year warranty Amazing

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 16, 2019
CommentsContent: Sturdier and bigger than I expected. This replaced an old stainless steel electric pot with a single flip switch. The beeps, when finished heating, are quiet and sophisticated, not obnoxious. I normally don‚Äôt go for the bells and whistle‚Äôs because it‚Äôs that much more that can go wrong but it seems sturdy. It‚Äôs pretty. If it doesn‚Äôt hold up I‚Äôll be back here to report.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 16, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle works quite well. It is big and sturdy, and holds a lot of water. And it can bring water to a boil quite fast. My only issues with it is that it seems to sometimes take just as long to heat water to some of the lower, preset temperatures as it does to boil water. And sometimes it seems to get confused with these lower temperatures: the LED light goes on and off for a while, but it doesn't seem to be heating the water very much, until, after a while of this, it finally beeps to indicate the water is done. Maybe it is trying to fine tune to a precise temperature, but I can't tell. Also, it can be hard to tell if the "keep warm" function is on when its heating water because the "start/stop" button above it is much brighter when illuminated. However, besides these very minor quibbles, it has served me well so far.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 15, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle works great. It is fast and the blue light when it is on is pretty. I like that the filter screen over the spout is removable. This pot is replacing my previous one of another brand because that screen disintegrated and wasn't replaceable. The only difficulty I had was working the lever to open the lid all the way- it is stiff and a bit of a challenge for arthritic fingers. It seems to be loosening up some so maybe that just needed to be used for a while. I'd recommend this.a couple of weeks later I am editing this to give 5 stars. I emailed the company with a question and they got back to me immediately. Impressive customer service! I've also noticed that with use and familiarity the tab on top to open the lid is easier to use.

CommentsTitle: This has been a life saver for the whole family
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 8, 2021
CommentsContent: I've recommended this product to all my friends. I've had it now for a few months & it works great! I love the temperature control quick easy settings & I love the "keep warm" feature. Easy to use, easy to clean & we don't have to use the microwave anymore for our tea like we were doing. I've used this for pour over coffee as well & it worked great üëç 10/10 would recommend!

CommentsTitle: One of the best ways to heat water
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 8, 2021
CommentsContent: After going through several hot water dispensers I was in the market for something different.I looked up various electric kettles. Most has the same issues.  Plastic or metal that rusts. Well not with this. The whole body is glass with maybe just a little plastic at top.I'm confident I'm not slowing leaching some chemicals with hot water.I also like the visual of it. You can see how much water you have or that it is on with the glow. I find the glow nice and not overwhelming.  I also like the various temperatur settings.  Helpful for different types of tea.I really like this. I would buy again for myself or others. Simple, affordable, esthetic and lasting.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2020
CommentsContent: This is our 4th electric kettle, but the first of this brand. It probably has a few too many choices of heat for what I need, but for some picky tea drinkers, it may make sense.  Overall, its a fine kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2020
CommentsContent: For some reason, I can't add a jpg picture on the project. But I love it. Heats up fast. I love the clear glass and being able to see into it. The blue lights are a nice touch! Makes the kettle more fun. 6 buttons with different degrees so all I do is push one and it heats up the water for me. I drink a lot of tea, so this kettle is definitely getting a lot of use!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle is exactly what I wanted for heating up water.  I was tired of using the microwave, so I purchased this kettle for my hot chocolates and herbal teas.  The controls are pretty easy to figure out.  I like how the buttons indicate the temperature.  Since I don't drink any other teas, the suggested tea temperatures threw me off a bit (oolong temp 212) - I don't particularly care what type of tea should be at what temperature, but for those that drink a variety of teas, I suppose this is a nice feature.Quick heat time.  Storage is nice too as the  base has a spot for the cord to go.I've used it at least a few times a week since purchased (roughly 3 months) and I haven't had any issues.  I wasn't sure if I'd like the glass pitcher, but it's light and doesn't seem easily breakable.

CommentsTitle: Excellent Product, Highly Recommend. What a time saver
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2021
CommentsContent: This is an excellent product.  We like it so much we bought several as gifts for family and friends.  It heats up the water fast and is a lot more efficient than waiting for the water to warm up on the stove top. I primarily bough it to heat water for tea but I also use it to heat water to start my gravies and to preheat the water for pasta.  It has saved a lot of time waiting for water to heat up for various baking and cooking recipes.  It is used everyday.  Excellent quality, versatile, and good looking.

CommentsTitle: I am really impressed and I love the light.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 18, 2019
CommentsContent: I love a lot about this kettle but I think the main thing is the light.  When I make tea I like to relax and this light glows beautifully in the kitchen.  I was very impressed with the speed in which it heated the water and it was SO NICE to not have to get up to turn the kettle on to make another cup of tea since this unit keeps that water heated.  It is a great price for a very functional and fun product.  I recommend.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I had this kettle for 2 months now and I could not be happier with it!There are several features that I love:The kettle has markings to measure how much water you are adding into it and as it is glass you can see easily how much water there is in, which is perfect to avoid wasting water.The handle is sturdy and does not heat up even if the kettle is full of really hot water.It has one defined button for each temperature which makes it really simple to pick the setting you want.The opening of the kettle is quite big and it is easy to clean the kettle inside or dry it up after use, as it is recommended for the fabricant.I love the look of it and the space blue when it is running.When the kettle has reached the desired temperature, it beeps once to let you know.I totally recommend this kettle!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 19, 2020
CommentsContent: water typically boils at 212 degrees F.  But at a mile high, it boils at around 202 degrees.  When I used the default (212 degree) setting the water kept boiling to reach the higher temp... it seems unnecessary.  Maybe that's why some kettles use a pressure sensor rather than a temperature sensor.In this case I simply choose the 202 degree setting.  It's perfect!  The water boils but doesn't need to overboil, consequently saving more energy.  I've used the kettle for more than 10 days and am very satisfied.While the blue light isn't necessary, it is pretty cool looking.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 4, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
  ¬†I purchased this to replace an in-sink hot water dispenser (we moved, new place doesn't have one). I'm really liking all the features (keep warm for 4 hours, quick, quiet, multiple temps and the blue light!). I use it mostly for water for my morning oatmeal and cup of coffee (it is only for water! do not add other stuff). It also has a min/max water capacity (2 cups - 8 cups), so I can make just one cup of coffee or several. Some kettles only have one water capacity, must be full every time. And it also has protection for if there is no water in the kettle when you run it. And a filter in the pour spout. Highly recommend!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2020

CommentsTitle: What I love about my new electric kettle .... EVERYTHING!!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 23, 2020
CommentsContent: I love my new electric kettle because it‚Äôs large enough to make 8 cups of whatever my favorite hot beverage may be at the time .. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020

CommentsTitle: Best combo of features: variable temp + blue light

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 28, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 8, 2020

This kettle stays hot for as long as you want it to. All you have to do is hit the keep warm button and it will maintain the temperature you choose as advertised. It‚Äôs a great kettle. Kind of pricey but it‚Äôs worth it. It also automatically shuts off after I think it‚Äôs 12 hours. I drink tea all day long and I don‚Äôt have to keep heating it up and waiting. It‚Äôs always perfect temperature.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 9, 2019
CommentsContent: I can't speak to its longevity since I have only owned it for about a week, but so far it has been awesome.  It looks modern and seems to be solidly built. It has been perfect for making green tea and for making coffee in our Aeropress,  both of which require specific temperatures for best taste. We are very happy to have chosen this kettle. Be aware that this is not a compact or small kettle; it can heat up to 8 cups of water and is fairly tall, but is nicely designed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 28, 2020
CommentsContent:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.










  
  
    
  ¬†This is by far the best kettle I've ever had. I love the different temperature controls, they definitely make a difference when it comes to the taste of the tea. The safety features are amazing, it turns off right after brewing, unless I press the keep warm button. And that's only one of the safety features that it comes with. CommentsTitle: Just what I was looking for

CommentsTitle: Nice looking and great features for the price.

  ¬†I just laid my Cuisinart variable temperature all stainless kettle to rest and loved it.  However, it is pricey to replace so I decided to give the Hadineeon glass kettle a try. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 21, 2020
CommentsContent: I‚Äôve been patiently waiting for this to arrive. I already had the perfect place on my counter next to my pour over set up. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2019

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2021

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2019
CommentsContent: We reviewed several electric kettles with variable temperature controls, and this one caught our eye. CommentsTitle: It's a large kettle that heats water at specific temperatures. Exactly what I wanted!

CommentsTitle: Great Product for a Great Price!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 2, 2020
CommentsContent: My old Cuisinart electric kettle died after many years of good use, and so I went in search of a replacement. I found this HadinEEon one with all the same features, and at around half the price as the Cuisinart, I thought why not give it a try. Boy was I not disappointed! This kettle works just as good as my old one, the only issue I have (and it's very minor) is that the beep that signals the kettle has reached the selected temperature is very low compared to the Cuisinart. This is only a problem if you leave the kitchen because the kettle also glows blue while heating and stops when done. Also the Cuisinart had more water level markers, but again that's not really a problem because it doesn't affect how well the product works. All in all I'm quite satisfied with my new HadinEEon electric kettle!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 8, 2020
CommentsContent: I ordered this product given that my friend had one and I was not disappointed. This product has an elegant shaped kettle and looks great setting on the counter top in my metal and glass bakers kitchen. The ease of assembly was ideal for someone like myself who doesn't like reading directions. The quality of this glass is great and can with stand a bit of beating without chipping and breaking. I didn't think using different temperature ranges for teas and chia made a difference but this kettle has really change the flavor profile for them all. Water doesn't take long to boil at all and the blue LED indicator is a great feature. Overall I think this is a great product but sometime like my hot chocolate scalding hot and it didn't get as hot but good otherwise.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle has been a great product for my needs.  The instructions are simple and straightforward. I appreciate the warming feature although I do not often find myself needing to use it.  It was important to purchase a product with a range of temperature settings and each one is adequate for the intended heating purpose.  There was a specific need for a larger kettle. This kettle is not used as an every day appliance. I would consider its use rare or less than average. Word to the wise that an electric kettle is not a shortcut to getting hot water and if you expect it to be one you will find yourself disappointed every time.  You will not get 8 cups of hot water in under thirty seconds unless you help it along with your personal heat ray or laser vision.  Please adjust expectations accordingly.

CommentsTitle: Excellent product, reliable, fulfills our requirements
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 27, 2020
CommentsContent: It took 5 minutes and 1 gallon of water to heat water at our kitchen faucet. We looked into installing undersink hotwater heaters, recirculating pumps, etc. The installed cost was over $600.We searched for an alternative and came up with the HadinEEon tea kettle at a fraction of the alternatives. It heats water quickly and provides sufficient hot water to wash our dishes. Could not be more satisfied with the product

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I love that I can have hot water available for 12 hrs. The different temp settings are great as is the chart in the manual listing ALL the different teas and what temp they should be brewed at. The ready beep is NOT too loud. The blue light that cycles on and off as it is keeping the water at the right temperature is pleasing. The button to open the lid almost requires two hands, however, the only time you need to open it is when filling or cleaning. The reason for deducting a star is because today it made a buzzing sound when it was off and not hot. I lifted the pot off of the base and it stopped and has not happened again. Not sure what that was or if it will continue. Maybe I will have to unplug it when not in use? Oh, and I wish the top had less plastic. Inside the top is stainless steel but it also has plastic surrounding the stainless...not preferred but I'm not concerned enough to not use it.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2020

This is a fantastic beginner kettle but not one for experienced users.If you're looking to pick up your first electric kettle I definitely recommend you buy this kettle; it's cheap and works well.If you're a current electric kettle user and looking to upgrade to something nicer, go with something else.

CommentsTitle: Sleek and elegant , easy to use ,  proud owner

CommentsTitle: More than electric kettle, a great companion

By the way control bottoms are accurate for what you need to get. For mate, I chose 160¬∞F and for green tea 175¬∞F. And you can chose the option to keep water at the same temperature: ideal for Yerba Mate which is a fancy ritual of kelp serving until it has no more substance.
