My only regret is not buying one sooner.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 4, 2019
CommentsContent: I‚Äôm super duper happy about this kettle. I loathe my glass top stove and this kettle remediates having to use it to heat water for tea. I have increased my tea consumption by 300%! It‚Äôs easy to use, nice to look at and so fast! My mom is jealous and I may have to buy her one for Christmas. Thank you HadinEEon for making this product where no plastic touches the hot water (if you remove the filter). Brilliant.

CommentsTitle: Works exactly as advertised, and well
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Headline says it all - for tea, ramen, coffee, and other foods and drinks that require water in a hurry, this kettle heats up water quickly and safely and keeps it warm for those times I walk away completely forgetting about what I had started heating the water for.  Sturdy construction, good lighting to indicate the heating status - this provides everything that one can ask for in a kettle. Unexpected bonus - we now have an unofficial pitcher for measuring up to a half gallon of water for recipes.

CommentsTitle: So Glad I Switched to This Kettle!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2020
CommentsContent: I'm a huge tea and cocoa drinker nearly every cool evening for comfort, warmth, and calming.  In the past I used whistling tea kettles that rusted or the whistle broke or both.  And once the whistle broke, I wound up forgetting to get the water and burning the pot which was a fire hazard too.  So this HadinEEon Kettle purchase has exceeded my expectations!  It boils faster than a metal kettle.  It TURNS OFF after the water is done boiling OR you can set it to KEEP THE WATER WARM!  That's brilliant when you want more than one cup of tea or cocoa or if you aren't quite ready to sit down yet.  It's also great if you are hosting many people because it holds so much water.  I like the way the kettle looks and watching the water boil too!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 20, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this kettle. Not only does it have a cool looking design but it makes my water temperature perfect for the type of tea I am drinking. It has a perfect temperature setting for my kids hot chocolate so very easy for them to use also. I love how a light comes on, it just makes it look even more expensive. I also love the warm feature. This is just an overall perfect kettle. Highly Recommended!!!

CommentsTitle: Six buttons for most common types of tea, heats quickly
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 10, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this kettle partially to prove to my friend that Oolong tea tastes better when brewed at the correct temperature. He has probably used it more than me now, lol. I really like the kettle as well. It's very simple to use, and has buttons with temperatures for pretty much any tea you could want to drink as well as a list in the handbook with what temperature a wide variety of teas should be brewed. It heats the water very fast as well, at least twice that of my old kettle. The heating element is stainless steel which is nice since then I don't have to worry as much about it rusting. It's heavier than I expected, but not that much more than a standard coffee pot. Overall this kettle was exactly what I was looking for and I'm happy with it.

CommentsTitle: Does it do it‚Äôs job - Is it worth the price tag?
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 20, 2019
CommentsContent: I bought it because of a few reasons: looks nice, temperature control and keep-warm function. It delivers. Just not over the top to warrant 5 stars given the hefty price tag. It does look cool while heating when the light is ok but there‚Äôs always some condensation forming at the top which does not look great when it‚Äôs off. Temperature control and keep warm functions work fine. Feels sturdy and well made. Whether I am satisfied with paying that much, I‚Äôm not so sure.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2021
CommentsContent: Love this so far! I hated that I could never drink my tea immediately after serving because I‚Äôd keep burning my tongue. So I got this temp control one and I love it so far! My husband is the coffee drinker so he uses it more than me and he loves it! He especially loves that it comes with the little filter in the spout too.

CommentsTitle: New Morning Work Horse for Hot Beverages!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2020
CommentsContent: This was purchased as a replacement for our older pot.  So far we are completely satisfied with it.  I like the look, the fact that it is glass is a plus as my previous model was all metal and appeared to have rust inside.  The added bonus features (variable control temperature, keep warm, various temperature option and larger capacity) are a definite plus. The look is pleasing to the eye, my toddler loves the blue light.  This is definitely going to be my new work horse for our morning beverages.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 28, 2019
CommentsContent: Revising review, product no longer works after only 8 months.

CommentsTitle: Great improvements with this new Kettle
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 11, 2021
CommentsContent: The HadinEEon Variable Temperature Electric Kettle, 1200W Electric Tea Kettle was purchased to replace our older kettle which stopped working. It was delivered quickly and put right to use. It has much better features including different temperature range buttons on the handle which are foolproof. It allows a medium heat setting for our dog food preparation and a boiling button for hot liquids. It works very well and heats up faster than the old model. The only thing I don't like is the way the lid closes. There is a slide button on top of the lid which is new and not the easiest to operate. The older model just snapped down to close. This new button can also pinch your finger if not careful. Overall a rating of 4 stars due to this issue.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2020
CommentsContent: During Thanksgiving 2019, it had a gd deal and I got this stuff. After almost 3 months use, I would say I really love their temperature setting so that I can easily choose how hot water is.However, I couldn‚Äôt use the ‚Äúkeep warm‚Äù function for 4 hours that mentioned by the seller.  Sometimes it worked to keep boiled water for 30 minutes or even a hour warm, then it did not have any light and never reboiled/reheated that boiled water again till I started to reboil water. Anyway ‚Äúkeep warm‚Äù function is just a bonus. It doesn‚Äôt  really bother me that much. I still love my electric kettle.

CommentsTitle: Very nice alternative to a stove kettle
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 3, 2020
CommentsContent: This is our third electric kettle, and our first from this company.  Our last kettle, from a different manufacturer, lasted only a few weeks.  Our first kettle (Mueller) lasted about a year.  It was great.  This one is bigger and fancier.  Frankly, all the extra buttons are not very useful.  I know the tea connoisseurs suggest that the perfect temperature is 95 degrees centigrade, not boiling point, but really?  I like the size and handle, but the lid is imperfect.  It has a filter tongue on it that serves no useful purpose, and sometimes gets stuck when you are trying to close the lid.  And it's not that easy to snap the lid down.  It's not watertight anyway, so why make it so hard?  Finally, this kettle doesn't heat the water as fast as our original Mueller kettle, which is disappointing.  Still, so far so good.

CommentsTitle: Love this Electric Kettle & would buy it again!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 12, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this kettle because it allows me to choose the temperature according to what I am brewing. My other pot got did not give me an option, and I always had to wait for the temp to cool down for my oolong tea. This one heats it right to the point for my French press, oolong tea, or my herbal teas. Would buy it again.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2020
CommentsContent: Best electric kettle out there for the money range!!! I bought a different one that was very similar but kept overheating the base which made the whole unit not work, NOTHING like that has happened with this unit. It's beautifully crafted kettle is a tad heavy but otherwise I'm extremely happy with it. I love that the filter is part of the lid and on the inside of the lid is a metal plate to help retain heat. Best kettle I've owned and it's my third electric kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this thing so far. It looks super classy out of the counter, I dont even bother putting it back in the cabinet. The blue light is really beautiful and helpful. The buttons are very straight forward and intuitive. The whole machine itself doesnt seem to get that hot even when the water is boiling so that's nice too.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 3, 2019
CommentsContent: Looks nice, not heavy.  Metal base protects glass from contact with stone counters.  Temperature controls almost exact--green tea was 170 degrees, not 175, but close enough.  Hubby finds the blue backlight when it's turned on "a bit over the top." Cannot immerse, but has not needed to be cleaned yet as we only boil water in it.  I had a solid stainless steel kettle that always looked smudged and one could never easily tell how much water was in it.  Only drawback is that one cannot open the top with one hand to add water.  I must open it while it is on the counter first.  Have used for about 2 months and so far no problems.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2021
CommentsContent: I don't write many reviews on the stuff I buy from Amazon because I normally don't have issues. I rely on reviews to give me an accurate description of what to expect from the products I am purchasing. Sadly, I feel like they failed me on this one. I received this item a few weeks back after looking for a electric kettle with variable temp control. I saw the reviews on this item and immediately felt like this was the best one for me. I loved the product at first. Worked well and made tea very quickly. However, it broke after three weeks of use. I have since decided to stick to my good old fashioned tea kettle. I'm hoping my experience was just a fluke but from looking at some of the reviews here, it definitely seems like others have had the same issue with this failing.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 10, 2020
CommentsContent: I have only had this kettle for 4 days and have used it every day.  The different temperature options are very useful for the various tea and coffee types. I purchased this kettle due to the great reviews. I will tell you all that I am curious to see if the kettle will continue to earn its nearly 5 star rating after a period of time.  Upon registering the product the company allows you a "free gift".  You can pick one of 5 or so small kitchen items as your gift. Upon requesting the "free gift" you receive a conditional email saying you will receive the gift after providing a few pieces of information as well as a written review.  Hey Amazon, will I still get my free gift after calling you out on this? I hope so, but not nearly as much as I hope the kettle continues to work, not rust, or have other issues after a few years of use.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 4, 2021
CommentsContent: I love this electric kettle. Water guaranteed to be the right temperature for a perfect cup of tea. I wish I had known about this product a long time ago. It is sleek and clean. Looks nice on my countertop. Easy to use. Recommend highly. It is a wonderful product and makes making a cup of tea, quick, easy and delicious!!

CommentsTitle: Came thru when needed the most!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2021
CommentsContent: So I ordered this because I use my stovetop kettle for coffee and tea everyday and decided to treat myself with this beauty. I loved it right way after receiving it Feb 9th shortly after I ordered it, but now I‚Äôm IN LOVE with it. I‚Äôm currently in Texas for this horrible deep freeze with no electricity and a boil water notice for anyone who has both. This product was a game changer when I gained electricity and water for a little over 20 mins (after not having it for 2 days) and this bad boy delivered. 2 full pots of safe drinking water got done in 21 mins! Hopefully no one else will need it the same way, but I‚Äôm so grateful for this purchase.*please note I‚Äôm referring to boiling filtered water. We don‚Äôt drink unfiltered tap water here in the small town of Houston.

CommentsTitle: Silent and nice looking kettle with convenient controls
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 26, 2019
CommentsContent: I've owned many kettles in the last 2 years, and this one seems the best so far. For me, the most important thing when choosing a kettle is the safety, and I loved this kettle with its glass design (which is healthy). The hot water does not touch to any plastic area inside the kettle which is also another important health consideration when using kettles. The temperature controls for different types of drinks is super convenient, and I especially liked the fact that it is more silent than other kettles I used before (including another one from the same brand). Last but not least, this is a fancy kettle with its blue light when the water is heating, it looks great with the glass design of the kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I really love the high capacity this kettle has. It can boil up to 2 liters which is about 8 cups or more. I used to run out of hot water for tea all the time and this kettle is great. I have been using it for more than 6 months now and it is working perfectly. It looks and seems clean. I love the blue light that goes on when it heats. I love this kettle.

CommentsTitle: Great tea kettle, would buy again!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 27, 2020
CommentsContent: Great tea kettle! Looks pretty and works great! I make black tea every morning but my daughter likes green tea. Love the timer for separate teas (gives a little beep at the end) and love the clear see through blue illuminated shell. Packed and shipped nicely. Not sure what what else to say . . . It heats the water in style.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I find it isn't difficult to find a kettle that heats water.  The part that turned out to be hard was the keep warm setting.  I returned another kettle that said it had that feature, but I couldn't get it to work.  This one works great.  Easy to use, easy to fill.  I love the glass so I can see how much water is there.  But the thing I really love is that I can turn it on keep warm, step into my series of meetings, and when I get a quick break hot water is waiting for me.  One note - when you keep water at 212 degrees, the evaporation is pretty quick.  Fortunately there are other temp settings.  I've learned to use 200 with the keep warm feature.  Otherwise I come back to very little water held at 212.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 21, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle is great I choose the temp I want and walk away. When it's heated to the temp it alerts me and I can set it to keep the water warm at that temp for up to 4 hours.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 26, 2020
CommentsContent: This is one of the best purchases I have made in years. Who would have thought a "keep warm" button and different temp levels would change your life. Now that I am working from home and have to make my own coffee, the stay warm feature is fabulous. I heat up the water in the morning and I have hot coffee water all day!! The other highlight is I have discover a slightly lower water temp makes instant coffee pretty good.  My previous kettle just had one temp ...boiling hot. With all that said, I'm very happy that I upgraded my kettle to the HadinEEon Variable Temperature Electric Kettle. Oh year, the 100% clear kettle is really cool also!!

CommentsTitle: has a mind of its own
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 30, 2021
CommentsContent: This is the second one I purchased.  The first one I had figured out, but this one was not the same or totally syko!  Just turning it on would make all the temperature buttons blink at once and it wouldn't heat up.  I called Amazon (just a few days before my 30 days was up - I hadn't unpacked it until a week or so prior) and they said to plug it into a different socket.  Well it did work, twice, but then went SYKO again.  I use it to heat up water 4-5 times a day to make lamb milk bottles and need something dependable.  When it does work it heats up great and holds the temperature.  At least the old one did for about a year.  Figured I would order one ahead of lambing and then this happened.  Still stuck with the stupid thing.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 10, 2020
CommentsContent: We bought this is August and couldn't be more happier! I've used it to heat water for anything from coffee and tea to ramen noodles. I love the clear buttons that light up when on and that I can keep the water warm in between or if I step away and forget. My last electric kettle I had to block all the light in the room to see if there button was lit up. This is so much better. It's also cool that you can see the boiling water bubbling.

CommentsTitle: Beautiful on the counter with temperature adjustability
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 8, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this for my motorhome in which we normally boondock and depend on solar. We try to be conservative in our power consumption.  Saving on wattage was premium. Although it's a bit slower than the 1500 watt stainless steel model I use at home, the 1200 watts this uses helps achieve that goal. The blue light is emitted from the base and  beautiful to look at while the water heats. The light goes out once it reaches temperature.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 23, 2019
CommentsContent: We ordered this kettle because we make different kinds of tea at home on the daily, and our original tea kettle not only small in volume but also just generally plain with one setting. We really enjoy the size of the of the kettle, and the beep when the water is ready is not loud, just enough to remind us the water is ready because sometimes we get distracted in the kitchen and forget. The keep warm option is also great when we want to make large amount of tea through out the morning or afternoon. The glass makes it easy to see if the kettle needs cleaning and the opening makes it easy to put my hand in there to clean.We've had this kettle for about 2 weeks, so far no complains.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 28, 2020
CommentsContent: So easy to use! I love the blue light that glows when it‚Äôs turned on, and the multi-function heat presets are great. Using the warming feature is convenient. I‚Äôve gotten several compliments from friends on how cool it looks, and one friend bought hers on the spot when she saw mine. Would definitely recommend to others.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 22, 2019
CommentsContent: This was a replacement for an old stove top kettle. I was able to use the kettle immediately as we had guests over. After a quick clean & rinse I heated my first kettle of water. I was impressed with how quickly the water heated . I didn't realize it when I purchased the kettle but it has the ability to hold the water at a chosen temperature. This came in quite handy and as a side benefit no one's tea scalded their mouths. I look forward to using my new kettle everyday.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Heats water relatively fast. No long wait times. Generous volume for my coffee press or for tea later. Heats water to the perfect temperature! Easy to fill and easy to use.  Lid that clicks into place so you know it is closed. Easy to pour and has mesh filter screen at the spout. Nice touch. Heating element protected by the design of the pot and the stand. Safe, insulated 3-prong electric cord.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 20, 2019
CommentsContent: I researched a bunch of reviews for a good glass kettle with temperature control, and decided to go with this one, and I think I made the right choice. I love high quality tea, (I have friends who import top grade pu er and oolong from China), so it's good to find a good deal for a nice kettle since the teas I buy are expensive enough as it is. The other options I considered all had common issues that I found in the reviews such as plastic inside the kettle, complicated controls, and of course high price. All in all, this was a great buy.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 14, 2021
CommentsContent: I use this kettle for tea and coffee so I love that there are so many options of temperatures for various types of tea. I never thought I would care about this but I love that it's clear. Becaause my friends mom told me a story about how she kept making coffee out of her opaque electric kettle and there was a cockroach in it for months without her knowing.  Will that ever happen to me with my new favorite electric kettle? No. Buy this and protect yourself. Also its just an excellent buy

CommentsTitle: Overall really good for the price
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 12, 2020
CommentsContent: Great kettle except my only two quirks are:1.) The lid needs to be pushed down ‚Äúwith intent‚Äù to close properly. Not necessarily forcefully but you can‚Äôt just close it fully without thinking like other kettles; it requires an extra push to click shut.2.) It needs to be descaled more than other kettles I‚Äôve had (probably because the glass allows light in which causes mineral crystals to form faster).

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 28, 2020
CommentsContent: The HadinEEon Variable Temperature Electric Kettle is a very good product.  I mostly use it to heat water for tea; It heats well, and fast, and the variable temperature features allow me to heat the water to the ideal temperature for white, green, oolong, and black teas.  My only critique is the base is not as sturdy as my former kettle, the Kinden.  The controls for the Kinden were on the base (hence, leading to it being more sturdy), whereas the HaddinEEon controls are on the top of the kettle handle.  I enjoyed the Kinden, however, it stopped working after less than 2 years of use, hence, I do not recommend the Kinden (and I do not believe you can purchase as when I went searching it was not only not available from Amazon, but could not find anywhere).  Most definitely worth spending a bit more on the HadinEEon!

CommentsTitle: Best Electric Kettle I have ever owned!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2020
CommentsContent: I LOVE this kettle!  I had a stainless steel one before this that worked for awhile but got so gunked up and it was hard to clean.  It was also irregular with heating.  I waited to write this review (purchased in March) to see how this one would perform.  It is the BEST!  It has multiple temp settings and each one is spot on.  It is also clear so easy to see the water level and to see when it needs to be cleaned.  Cleaning is a breeze.  Can't say enough good things about this one!! You won't regret this purchase if you need a new kettle!

CommentsTitle: This water kettle is what I've been missing in my kitchen
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 17, 2021
CommentsContent: I am so excited for this electric kettle! I looked at many products, and their reviews. This one was the best one. I unboxed it after it was delivered today. I used my zero water pitcher for the water, and I made loose leaf tea after the kettle finished heating the water. It only took a few minutes to come to temp, and it's perfectly hot! I love the light and the beep sounds, so I know when it's complete. I also love the keep warm option! I have many things I need this water kettle for, and I can't wait to get started. I highly recommend this water kettle!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2020
CommentsContent: The HadinEEon Electric Kettle Glass Boiler Coffee Pot, Water Heater 7 Big Cups 1.8 Liter with Quick Boil, Auto Shut Off and Boil-Dry Protection works great.  Previously heated water up in the microwave or in a teapot which was heated on the stove and used the heated water for a cup of tea or coffee, but using this kettle is easier.  Simply plug the kettle in, set the appropriate setting and within minutes the water is boiling. The large kettle size provides approximately 8 cups of water. The glass allows you to see though the kettle and watch the water bubbles come to a boil.  There are 6 settings to  use and an automatic shutoff button.  The LED blinking light shows that the kettle is still on while in the warm mode.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 13, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this electric kettle for two reasons - the glass body to see the water level more clearly, and the pre-programmed temperature settings. I use an aero-press and occasionally french press for coffee, so this product satisfied both needs perfectly. Temperature is consistently hot and extremely easy to use. Would definitely recommend!

CommentsTitle: This tea pot does it all!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 22, 2020
CommentsContent: I had purchased a cheaper electric kettle, but it didn't have the "keep warm" feature. Found it quite annoying that after the water boils, it did not stay hot. This is one of the only kettles I found with the "keep warm" feature, which allows me to have hot water for four hours after the water boils, and keeps it at your desirable temp (i.e., there are four pre-programmed water temps you can choose to hold your water temp at.)I am so happy with this feature; exactly what I want when all my family is together for Thanksgiving and someone is always wanting a hot drink; now even the grandkids can have hot cocoa immediately. Well done!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 26, 2020
CommentsContent: Update: We have been using this every couple of days for the last three months and it still works really well.We have only used this kettle twice so no idea of longevity yet. Heats up really quickly and has a nice beep noise when ready. It does sound like a tiny jet engine while heating, it's not offensive but it is a bit loud. The bottom of the kettle is not hot to the touch after heating, which means you can put the kettle on the counter/table without a trivet

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I'd been looking for a really nice kettle for a while before stumbling upon this one. I have to say I was a little hesitant to spend what seemed like a lot of money on this but in the end I regret nothing and it was worth every cent.The water boils super quickly depending on how much you fill it and I have yet to have a single problem with temperature or anything.The buttons are really nice and don't feel like they will fall apart easily and I absolutely love the handle because I can lift and pour my boiling water without fear of burning myself.Definitely worth your consideration at least.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 1, 2021
CommentsContent: The last kettle we bought started leaking after a little less than a year, so then we got this one. We have only had this one a few months so I cannot comment on the leaking issue but otherwise, I love it. There are various heat settings, they all seem to work well enough although I have not tested with a thermometer. There is an option to keep the water warm after heating which will trigger it to reheat from time to time as the water cools (I think that feature is pretty neat). Lastly, I love the blue light when the water is boiling but that is more aesthetic than anything.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 18, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle is very attractive....pretty lights go on as it heats up. It has six temperature settings ( I never knew tea had different settings...!) ( 160‚Ñâ, 175‚Ñâ, 185‚Ñâ, 190‚Ñâ, 200‚Ñâ, 212‚Ñâ)Heats up quickly, the glass is easy to clean and it has an automatic shutoff in case you forget about it.I like it very much. I've never had one before. In our city, we have a lot of minerals in the city water and my old stove top kettles would get a lot of calcium build up which was difficult to clean because of the shape of the kettle. This is very easy to wipe the calcium out .

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2021
CommentsContent: We just started using this kettle and we already love it. The temperature control functions are great., and the base plate lets you swivel the kettle in any direction. We used it to make coffee for our French press, and the coffee turned out amazing. We always heat up the water too much when using a stove top kettle and end up nearly burning the coffee. The kettle get the exact temperature we want and the light functions look really nice. The only issue I‚Äôve found is that the alert beep to let you know the water has reached temperature could be a little louder, but it‚Äôs not really a big deal. We really like the product and will be using it to make our French press coffee and teas.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 9, 2021
CommentsContent: Every day I drink hot coffee in the morning, then black tea, at lunch time, I drink green tea, and herbal tea at night. I LOVE the temperature feature on this tea kettle, it removes the wondering if I have let the boiling water cool enough for my green tea. I noticed I even drink more tea now! Great product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 9, 2021
CommentsContent: I purchase one of these for my office and fell in Love with it and so did my daughter in law . I purchase one for her at Christmas and it was a BIG hit . Everyone loved the ease of it and the variable temperature setting for the different teas , coffee and hot chocolate beverage they want. This is my third one I have purchase . This one is for my home. T

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 15, 2020
CommentsContent: I have been using this kettle for a week now. So far I am happy with how everything works. The temperature control is functioning properly, I like how I can pick different temperatures depending on which drink I‚Äôm making. For example, black tea versus green tea. I like the delicate setting, this temperature heats up to the perfect temperature where I can drink hot water, but not hot enough to where I burn myself. The keep warm setting is also pretty cool, but I have not tried that out just yet. The blue lights are a nice addition.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 11, 2021
CommentsContent: I've had multiple electric kettles.  This one has been the easies to fill with water and maintain.  Temperature select is my favorite feature because I like my kettle to be ready to use multiple times in the morning.  The other feature I like is the blue glow of the pot and buttons so I can use easily use without turning on bright kitchen lights.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 9, 2019
CommentsContent: Wow didn't think this tea kettle would get much use.  The family loves it.  We use it for tea, hot chocolate and instant coffee if we don't need a full pot.  Love how fast and how much water it holds.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2020
CommentsContent: We are using this electric kettle to heat water for instant coffee and various teas, including green, black and herbal teas. The variable temperature control is great for green tea and instant coffee which do not require boiling water.  The taste of all beverages brewed so far is great, the water is in direct contact only to stainless steel and glass. There is a removable filter at the spout of the kettle which is not really needed for water, suggesting the possibility of brewing tea directly in the kettle.  I would never do this and would not recommend it as tea always leaves nasty stains.  The warranty offered suggests that the manufacturer has trust in this product.  I can only recommend this  kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 16, 2021
CommentsContent: I have been entirely satisfied with this kettle so far. You should read the brief operating instructions, but its controls are intuitive and easy to use for heating and for keeping the water hot. Blue LEDs are mostly decorative, I guess, but also provide visual cue for when the kettle is actively heating.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 13, 2020
CommentsContent: This is just exactly what I was looking for!!Love the blue light it has when it's on. It's nice that there are different temperature controls,we drink different teas so for each you have right temperature which is cool!!Also like the idea that it beeps before kettle turns off. CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 15, 2020

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 14, 2019
CommentsContent: I make green tea every day so I wanted to invest in a plastic free, all glass and stainless steel, variable temperature electric kettle. This is the one I chose after a LOT of research. It works and looks great so far (had it for 1 day). However, the temp button or temperature sensor isn't accurate. When I click the green tea button and wait for it to finish warming and measure the temperature with a thermometer, it is only 165 degrees when it needs to be 175. 185 button only warms to 173.5 before shutting off, 190 button to 182 degrees. Not sure why. Maybe bad testing during manufacturing? It boils at 203 for me, but that's normal given that I'm at 5000 ft elevation and boiling point of water is lower here. It's not like it can go hotter than boiling. But I'm disappointed that the temperature buttons are not accurate and I'll have to remember to click the 185 button to get to the right temperature to brew my green tea (~175).

CommentsContent: We've had this kettle for several months now, and it's been a great addition to our kitchen. The ability to adjust to multiple heat setpoints based off your drink needs is a great feature that we did not have with our previous kettle. Other great features include the clear glass allowing visibility and the overall pleasant aesthetics of the appliance. Zero complaints, and I would definitely recommend to friends and/or family members if they needed a kettle!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 10, 2021
CommentsContent: I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas, and he absolutely loves it.  He likes that it gets the water up to temperature quickly, and he can use the keep warm button so he can have the water ready immediately.  He likes to have a few cups of tea in the morning, but used to use the microwave to get his water hot.  This kettle gets the water ready in about the same amount of time, but if he forgets or gets busy then the water is still ready and he doesn't have to heat up more water for his next cup.  He uses this every day, and says it's the best gift he got.

CommentsTitle: Very good kettle for the price! Remember to read the manual before using!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 27, 2020
CommentsContent: I love the different temperature control and the stay warm feature. This thing will be a good new companion for me and my dorm room. As for some of the reviews I have read, they have included some warning and tips in the instruction manual on how to properly use this product anyways. Besides, you get 1 year of guarantee money back plus 2 more years of normal warranty. I think this is a reasonably priced product. I'd recommend anyone to buy it to enjoy their tea, coffee, or even filtered water!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 30, 2020
CommentsContent: Works perfectly! My husband has been working at home since covid and he loves his tea but didn't want to have to keep getting up to turn the kettle back on so this has been perfect for keeping the water warm throughout the day without having to constantly get up!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 10, 2020
CommentsContent: Boiled water in under 10 minutes.  To keep water warm, I didn't realize that one has to press the Keep Warm button first before boiling the water.  It didn't work if it is depressed after the kettle is set to boil.  I had to go back to and the read the product page on Amazon to get this wonderful feature to work!  :-/  Perhaps the manufacturer can fix this usability flaw in its future version of this product.  Regardless this is best kettle I have had - really love the variable temperature and keep warm features.

CommentsTitle: Easy to use. Sleek, modern kettle.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States May 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I'll start by saying that it's hard to get excited about a tea kettle, but kettle is so good looking on the counter. It's sleek and modern, but enough about its looks. This thing is perfect for making tea. My wife likes different types of teas and unbeknownst to me more delicate teas do not (should not) be steeped in boiling water (who knew?!). Anyway, this kettle has multiple different temperature settings for different types of tea. It's also great for use with my french press in the morning. Overall it's a great kettle and I highly recommend!

CommentsTitle: Terrific kettle! Love the temperature controls for tea!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 6, 2021
CommentsContent: I am loving this tea kettle. I have had it for over 2 months and it does not disappoint. I love coffee and all versions of tea - green tea, black tea, herbal tea, fruit teas - and this allows me to get the right temperature water for proper brewing! Too hot of water is especially bad for green and black tea - too hot and the tea will be bitter. I also use for french press and pour over coffee.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 3, 2021
CommentsContent: Really nice kettle. A huge improvement over the stove top screaming kettle that it replaces. Automatic, cooler to the touch, nice blue lighting, see through, and no screaming steam. Also, keep warm feature, detachable base, and multiple temp settings.

CommentsTitle: Great teapot at a great price
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 10, 2020
CommentsContent: This is a nice teapot. Initially, I felt the base was a little flimsy feeling compared to Breville electric teapot we have. Despite this, I really like that it lights up and it has some nice features at a great price point. We have only used it a few times so I am not sure about the longevity of the product but so far it works well and has all the features I was looking for. I really like having the options of the different temperature settings versus just boiling water. Lastly, this company has excellent customer service.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 18, 2020
CommentsContent: I am very impressed with this kettle.  It has 6 different temperatures for optimal brewing for my tea types and coffee.  The KEEP WARM button is so convenient for brewing the next cup of tea or coffee without waiting to heat up water again. It is made of qualified grade material and also has safety auto-shutoff Protection. I always feel safe to leave the kettle alone. With a warranty of 3 years for the product, I am so confident in making this an extremely good purchase.

CommentsTitle: Fast and clear electric tea kettle has many great features
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 11, 2020
CommentsContent: I love that it is clear and I can see the water level and watch it boil. I also love the blue LED light.  The LED light looks beautiful on this tea kettle when we turn off our regular ceiling lights. I also love the auto turn off feature after 4 hours and the keep warm feature. For tea lovers, the variable temperature settings are very nice. It holds a large amount of water (8 cups) and brings it to boiling super fast. Great product. I highly recommend it.

CommentsTitle: Fast, accurate temp control for perfect tea
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2021
CommentsContent: I last purchased a variable temp water kettle in 2011 and decided it was time to update. I initially liked this one because of the clear glass body. It works like a champ.  You can see what is happening. The individual settings for different tea types works flawlessly. It also heats fast and looks great on my counter. There is nothing more satisfying than having a cup of oolong or green tea actually brewed at the correct temp. It‚Äôs been three months and we are still happy with our choice.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: What is the point of the temperature control if the thermostat doesn‚Äôt work? When I choose 200 degrees the water only heats up to 150, and I have used two different thermometers to confirm it.Updat (12/26)Great customer service!  I decided not to return this since I didn‚Äôt have the box. The company saw my review and reached out to ask me how they could make it right. They sent me a new kettle and it works perfectly!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 14, 2020
CommentsContent: Been using this for several months and I must say: you get what you pay for! And I mean it in a good way!!! Temperature control is on point, the ‚Äústay warm‚Äù feature is very useful for when you have guests that don‚Äôt want a cup of tea but once u serve and start drinking it they want it :))

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased an expensive Breville kettle for myself and regretted how much I spent on it when it broke within a year. This kettle was purchased as a birthday present for a friend who loves tea. It is glass, has pre-set temperature controls for different types of tea or for coffee/boiling water. The LED lights are cute and it heats water fast with a beep to let you know when it is finished. I like that the cord can wrap around the base to keep it neat when not in use. Overall, great product at a great price.

CommentsTitle: L O V E  I T  !!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 12, 2020
CommentsContent: i am a tea drinker.  I had a Capresso Plus Glass Water Kettle that served me well for years and it finally gave out.  I was desperate for a replacement !!  who wants to go back to heating water on the stove?  i really liked the glass aspect of the Capresso and was going to just get another one, but i started to look at others.  this model caught my eye and had so many reviews (90% positive), more water temp features AND it was cheaper !!!  when does that ever happen ???  and BONUS with prime it came to my doorstep within 2 days.  you will have to pry this from my cold dead fingers (hopefully wrapped around a fresh cup of tea) ‚Ä¶.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 3, 2020
CommentsContent: After travelling to Ireland and Iceland and every place I stayed in had an electric kettle, I knew I really wanted one. Did a ton of research and couldn't be happier with this purchase. No need for a coffee pot on the counter- this kettle and my french press make way better coffee. With 6 temperature settings it makes perfect tea every time, plus has a feature to keep it warm. The cord keeper is great. I do have to descale hard water if I don't always use bottled water, but that's easy to do. The lights and audio cues make it easy to know when water's ready or program is changing. Highly recommend this product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I bought this pot over a year ago, and have used it since.  It still works great, heats and then holds the heat, and makes life easier when it comes to making tea, French press coffee, or Vietnamese coffee.  Using a little cream of tartar occasionally keeps it free from scaly build-up from hard water.  Just a good product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle is simply the best one that I'd ever owned.First, it holds a massive 2 L of water whereas most of the other kettles out there hold 1.7 L.Second, it heats the water quickly with an option to choose the best temperature for the type of tea that I'm brewing.Third, and best of all it has a keep warm setting so I can go back and make a 2nd cup of tea without having to wait for the water to heat up. I like this kettle so much I've been thinking of ordering a second just to have a spare.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2019
CommentsContent: This kettle works exactly as advertised.  It feels durable and well made. The lid stays in place when opened all the way, making it easy to fill with water, and the latch feels secure when closed. The buttons make it convenient to quickly select a temperature, and the keep warm function is great for making multiple cups of tea. I also purchased a stainless steel coffee filter to use with this kettle and have completely replaced my Keurig with this setup. If you enjoy tea, coffee, and not filling land fills with plastic K-Cups, this kettle is for you.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 5, 2019
CommentsContent: This kettle is wonderful. The choices of what temperature to make for tea are very handy. I drink tea all day, and like steeping it at the proper temperature. I worked at Starbucks for years, and having the chance to make tea or coffee properly at home is great! There is also a feature where you can keep the water hot for hours. This is convenient for when I am home in the evenings and want multiple cups of tea. No waiting for it to boil again.I highly recommend this kettle.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 16, 2021
CommentsContent: This kettle works well and consistently keeps water at the right temp. It's easy to clean, and even comes with a cleaning packet for the first time you want to descale it. It does take a little bit of time to heat up the water, but that's because it gradually increases to your desired temperatures. Sometimes the middle temps take the longest as it is switching on and off to make sure it doesn't bring the water up too quickly / hot. Solid, dependable.

CommentsTitle: Great kettle for tea lovers (green and white especially)
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 22, 2020
CommentsContent: Love this kettle. Very quick to heat a full kettle <4 min to full boil. Also like the hold temp feature so I don‚Äôt have to worry about constantly re heatingThe tea temps are a little off depending on the brewer recommendation but it‚Äôs easy enough to get to the right temp by going just over the suggested temp and 1) waiting 2-5 min or 2) adding a little cool water. I love green and white tea so this is perfect for making sure my cups are not bitter.Have had this for ~3 months and use essentially everyday. Fantastic product!

CommentsTitle: Fantastic Value, Easy to Use, and Beautiful design
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I love this kettle. I am so happy with my kettle.  It has such a  beautiful design. It is  very simple use. I use this everytime I need hot water.  It comes to a quick boil in 7 minutes and the base lights up blue while it is  heating.  This is the best kettle I have ever used.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 15, 2020
CommentsContent: This is the 5th electric kettle we have owned. The first units were good products, but never lasted more than 2 years each. The next 2 were less expensive options, but were only OK. This kettle is really cool with the glass body and LED light show. So far (4 months) the kettle has worked flawlessly. I do have one issue which doesn't detract from the operation of the kettle, but is most inconvenient. The lid doesn't close fully unless you forcefully close it. All the other kettles we've owned have easy opening and closing. When you go to pour the water out, if the lid isn't closed completely, the water dribbles everywhere.

CommentsTitle: LED back light, and temp control!!!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 7, 2021
CommentsContent: Love the feature that you can chose how hot the water can be, depending on what and where you gonna use it.  Love the blue LED back light on the keys. Make it easy to see in the dark or at night.  All in all a great product.  Definitely recommended üëå.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 29, 2020
CommentsContent: I was a bit hesitant to order a brand I had not heard much about, but this kettle arrived quickly and it gets the job done!  I drink many different types of tea throughout the day, and the various temperature settings make each pot just right.  And major plus, it looks really cool when it's on with the blue LEDs surrounding the bottom of the kettle.My only complaint would be that it sometimes takes some time before it shuts off when the water reaches a boil.  I think it may be because I live at altitude and water boils at a lower temperature.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 7, 2019
CommentsContent: Bought this kettle for about one or two weeks. It's been working well so far. I haven't had to clean it yet, but don't think that it would require too much effort.It's not too loud. It heated to the desired temperature fairly quickly.It's a little annoying when keeping the water warm. It would keep making this "clicking" sound.Overall, it's easy to use and understand. With minor improvement on how to use the KEEP WARM function would make it great, but it was fairly easy to figure out how to use it.Overall, a quality product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 30, 2019
CommentsContent: I looked extensively for a good electric kettle that does not come in touch with plastic while warming up the water. This fits that profile. So far it has performed very well and expect that not to change.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 26, 2020
CommentsContent: I absolutely love this tea kettle! I like that it is glass.  It is beautiful on the kitchen countertop and I particularly like the various temperature choices by tea type.  There is very little plastic.  So when I used it the first day after washing it thoroughly, I did not taste or smell plastic.  It‚Äôs a very large kettle, which is perfect for a large family or anyone who loves to drink a lot of tea.  I HIGHLY recommend it for the brand and the customer service of this company.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 13, 2021
CommentsContent: We got this kettle for use in our office. Everyone enjoys!Feature-wise, the only suggestion would be for the kettle to remember the heat setting when you pick it up from the base. For example, when you are preparing pour-over coffee and need to return the kettle to the base several times as the water filters through the grounds, it is a minor inconvenience to have to confirm the heat selection each time. We would prefer that you would have to press a button to change or stop the last setting used.However, this is a small inconvenience and we still give the product a 5 star rating without hesitation!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Works great but the audible beeps it makes absolutely terrorize our dogs, who flee the house and shake whenever we try to use it. We got a replacement but it did the same thing. Other brands never did this to our dogs.Manufacturer was VERY responsive to the problem... unable to resolve, but offered to make it more than right.  We still have not received refund, though... not sure how to make that happen.

CommentsTitle: EXCELLENT TEA KETTLE for all tea types!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 28, 2020
CommentsContent: I LOVE this tea kettle! My husband and I have been hot tea drinkers for years and have had other electric kettles but this one definitely beats them all. I love the temperature settings and even though it doesn‚Äôt cover every type of tea leaf the settings it has will work for any tea leaf out there. It has a nice blue glow while it is on and heating and the temperature has been very accurate heat. It looks nice out on the counter and the glass feels very nice and solid. I would recommend this to the pickiest of tea lovers out there. If we love it you definitely will too!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 27, 2020
CommentsContent: Wonderful, sturdy kettle, nice design, good size on the counter. The temperature controls are accurate and give you the proper temperature to brew each type of tea. The keep warm function is nice, but you have to push it after the water is heated. It doesn't automatically keep warm for a bit.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 7, 2020
CommentsContent: This kettle is perfect! I like that we can choose a temperature, press a button, and walk away while the water boils. We used to stand over the stove with a kettle and had to monitor the temperature closely. This has saved us time and effort! The product is beautiful and easy to use. Highly recommend!

CommentsTitle: Pretty awesome and a lot less crazy than my stove-top tea pot
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 21, 2020
CommentsContent: We've had a great whistling tea kettle for decades but it kept boiling over onto the stove and making us crazy.  So we bought this guy.  Works great.  A lot less hassle.  I wish the beeps at the end of the heating process were louder.  You have to be right next to it to hear.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 4, 2019
CommentsContent: Both me and my husband are so thrilled over this tea kettle. Not only it‚Äôs beautiful and modern but adds a flare to our kitchen. You can actually see the water boiling. Our favorite feature are of course the lights but also the warming feature. It also has recommended temperatures for various teas. So no guessing work. We definitely recommend this product and buying from this merchant.

CommentsTitle: Definitely Recommend Especially for Coffee Lovers
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 17, 2020
CommentsContent: I purchased this electric kettle for my husband to make his pour over/french press coffee! The different temperature settings are great to help prevent burning the coffee. The bigger size also allows us to brew more compared to a lot of other electric kettles.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 1, 2020
CommentsContent: Works great, no problems so far (more than a month in use). Buttons little bit stiff, but no problem to switch between different modes. Great that kettle is glass is clear and hold more water than competition in the same price range. Remember to hear the click when closing lid, to make sure lid is completely closed.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 25, 2020
CommentsContent: This water kettle is one of the better kettles I've tried. I very much like that there is settings for different temperatures of tea. It gives me much room to heat it to as I would want. I also like that it will keep heating it up until I get the water I need in case I can't get to it right away. It is a pretty great product.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States January 20, 2020
CommentsContent: Had a Breville electric kettle for over 6 years but it finally hit the skids.  There are a lot of electric kettles out there but this one had great reviews. Having specific temperatures for different teas allows us to enjoy the best of both the tea and coffee worlds.  The design is very functional and the blue light around the glass makes it nice to watch.  Additionally we like the "keep warm" feature because sometimes I boil water for one thing, and the remaining water can be used a little later for something else and still be kept warm.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 6, 2020
CommentsContent: We've just used our new kettle this morning and I am so impressed. I hate to say it, but I've been burning my tea for a long time it appears. The taste is very different when you use the right temperature. So far it is great, and since the manufacturer offered a three year warranty, we feel we're covered. Love the looks also, very stylish, a bonus.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States April 1, 2021
CommentsContent: Disclosure: I was promised a $20 Amazon gift card for reviewing the product, but the rating is my own judgement.My wife purchased this kettle as a gift for me, and I love it! I like that it lights up when the water is heating up and the light goes off once the water reaches the correct temperature. It's a bit pricey compared to single-setting kettles, but is a good price for multiple-temp kettles. I like it enough that I would buy another if it broke, and I highly recommend it for anyone looking to up their tea game.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States December 22, 2019
CommentsContent: HadinEEon's electric tea kettle had wonderful reviews, a lengthy warranty, and great customer service.  I bought this as a holiday gift so I haven't seen it in action yet.  However, the box (high quality cardboard- not flimsy cheap stuff) and product protection are great.  Time will tellThey did offer one of 6 nice gifts if I left a review :)  which prompted me to write, but nothing was said about writing a GOOD review!  From the consumer's point of view, if the company goes to the high quality end in shipping, my guess is the product is high quality as well.  I will write back after I know how the kettle works.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 24, 2020
CommentsContent: We had a difficult time replacing an old electric tea kettle that we loved. I set it for 212 degrees and fill it to capacity line.  It heats quickly and fills both our French press pots.  Couldn't ask for a better kettle.

CommentsTitle: Decent looking product and does its job
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States June 30, 2020
CommentsContent: This electric kettle was purchased 3 months ago and used daily to boil ice-cold water dispensed from the fridge, and it heats up water quicker than a gas stove. Happy with the purchase.

CommentsTitle: I don't know what took me so long!
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 9, 2020
CommentsContent: I have never owned an electric kettle. I have always owned a stove top kettle, but my husband insisted we try an electric one. This one not only looks cool, but it works really well! I will now be converting the rest of my family to this particular kettle. Best purchase I have made in a while.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 8, 2019
CommentsContent: I use this product exclusively for boiling water to steep tea in.  The minimum level is 1 cup, so it works well even if I'm the only one drinking. I haven't tested the "keep warm" feature yet, but it looks simple to use again - a single button.  There is a small amount of residue of some kind appearing on the bottom of the kettle on the heating surface after ~1 month of use; haven't tried to clean it off as it doesn't seem to be affecting the functionality.

CommentsTitle: Heats up quickly. Excellent safety features. Outstanding customer service.
CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States July 25, 2020
CommentsContent: This product is amazing. We bought for my mother‚Äôs 85th  birthday because she needed a tea kettle with safety features. It immediately heats up with ‚Äúpretty lights‚Äù which turn off when water is at desired temp.  It keeps water at the correct temperature through out the day. We had an unexpected malfunction about 6 months after we bought it. We notified the manufacturer who sent a new one in days.  They tried to help us troubleshoot and were so professional. Because of the pandemic - we did not need to send the old one back.This tea kettle and the customer service has been outstanding.  This is definitely the kettle to purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States November 16, 2020
CommentsContent: Was a little apprehensive after reading some of the negative reviews, but this has been a great electric kettle so far! It keeps water hot, has a sleek look, PLENTY of heat settings and options, and lets me know when it's heated with a beep. I can see how some people may have trouble hearing the beep as it's not very loud, but it's loud enough to hear from anywhere in my kitchen or living room. Even if you don't hear the beeping, the blue light changes as well as an extra indicator. Easy enough to clean with just a cycle of white vinegar and then back to brand new! Solid product and very happy with this purchase.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States February 10, 2021
CommentsContent: I like that this product has different temperature options for different teas, coffees, etc. It does take longer to heat than some other products but not by much. It is tempered glass and has a blue light that lights up when its heating and it creates a great aesthetic. It has a keep warm function that works GREAT! I work in a restaurant and there isnt a hot water spout in the bar for hot drinks so we have to walk all the way to the kitchen. This is the solution and it keeps warm for 4 hours. It has been such a great addition to the bar.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States October 31, 2020
CommentsContent: The kettle I bought from Costco works well, but the lid doesn't fully close. The HadinEEon on the other hand, has a nice tight lid and has temperature control for tea and coffee, which the one from Costco did not.PROS:  temp control, keeps warm, seems durable, nice lidCONS: None really. The glass does sound more plasticky than the one from Costco, but it also seems more durable (it is glass though).

CommentsTitle: Great kettle but the spout is so-so

One thing I am slightly unhappy about is the spout, it just doesn't direct the water as well as I'd like. All in all, a great purchase!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 2, 2021
CommentsContent: Bought this kettle back in January. After a month's use, it started leaking from the bottom somewhere, but was not able to detect the leak. May be I received a faulty kettle, but functionality is good. Contacted customer service and they were very prompt in replacing it with a new one immediately. Excellent customer service and it comes with 3 years manufacturing warranty. Cannot go wrong. Kettle works fine.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States March 12, 2020

The kettle is sturdy and, being made of glass, does not have the residue you sometimes see in metal kettles.  Again, so far so good, everything works as expected and, hopefully, it stays the same.

CommentsTitle: Excellent Product..... we use it everyday......how did we function without it ! LOL!

My only wish is that the top wasn't so clunky to pop open or make sure it's closed a few times it's not shut and I've caught it before it could pour more severely hot water everywhere.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 7, 2020

CommentsTitle: Great Investment!  You will not regret!

I've used several days so far, functions and works as described! I am very satisfied with this investment as I researched many prior to this purchase!  I'm really happy with this choice!  Thank you!

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States September 30, 2020
CommentsContent: I‚Äôve waited a few months to really use this electric kettle and I have to say I love it. It‚Äôs worth the money. I used it almost daily and it haven‚Äôt failed me. There are no mineral deposits and I leave water in mine just for ease of use.

CommentsDate: Reviewed in the United States August 10, 2020
CommentsContent: Having been accustomed to heating water in a stove top kettle, I wasn't sure how an electric kettle would compare. I drink hot tea all day long so it's my favorite feature; however, it sometimes shuts off even when I have the keep-warm feature selected.  Not a deal breaker, but a little irritating.  I'd still recommend the kettle if you're looking for a way to keep water warm/hot all day long.
